XXavsata_u:247: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:250: pūrvakāyam atyunnamayya *{abhyunnamayya}* dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:257: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā kṛtyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:258: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:260_0: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
XXavsata_u:260_2: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
XXavsata_u:261: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:262: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:266: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:267: jñātayaḥ ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani sarvakulaṃ nanditam, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya nanda iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:269: nando dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:270: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:272: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ paṃcavarṣaḥ ṣaḍvarṣo vā, tadā kusīdaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paramakusīdaḥ /
XXavsata_u:275: atha śreṣṭhina etad abhavat: so 'pi me kadācit karhicid devatārādhanayā putro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:278: tat kiṃ mamānenedṛgjātīyena putreṇa, yo nāma svasthaśarīro bhūtvā paśur iva saṃtiṣṭhatīti //
XXavsata_u:280: tena ṣaṭ tīrthikāḥ śāstāraḥ svagṛham āhūtāḥ:
XXavsata_u:281: api nāma ayaṃ dārakas teṣāṃ darśanād gauravajātaḥ śayanāsanād api tāvad uttiṣṭhet* /
XXavsata_u:282: atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāstṝn dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥsaṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:283: kaḥ punar vāda utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā,
XXavsata_u:285: atha sa gṛhapatis tām evāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:286: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:287_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:289_1: trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:290_0: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ
XXavsata_u:290_2: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:297: AVŚ_3.1 apy evātikramed velāṃ sāgaro makarālayaḥ /
XXavsata_u:298: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:300: ayaṃ dārakaḥ kusīdo maddarśanād vīryam ārapsyate yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ pariṇāmayiṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:301: tato bhagavatā tīrthyānāṃ madadarpacchittyarthaṃ dārakasya ca kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇamarīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:303: kalpasahasraparibhāvitāś ca maitryaṃśava utsṛṣṭāḥ, yair asya spṛṣṭamātraṃ śarīraṃ prahlāditam* /
XXavsata_u:304: sa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
XXavsata_u:305: tato bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas tad gṛhaṃ praviveśa /
XXavsata_u:306_0: dadarśa kusīdo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣulakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītyā
XXavsata_u:307: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ prasādam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:308: sahasā svayam evotthāya bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayati /
XXavsata_u:309: evaṃ cāha: etu bhagavān, svāgataṃ bhagavataḥ, niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsana iti /
XXavsata_u:310: athāsya mātāpitarāv antarjanaś cādṛṣṭapūrvaprabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ vismayam āpannāḥ //
XXavsata_u:311: tataḥ kusīdo dārako harṣavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:312: tasmai bhagavatā anekaprakāraṃ kausīdyasyāvarṇo bhāṣitaḥ, vīryārambhasya cānuśaṃsaḥ /
XXavsata_u:313: candanamayīṃ cāsya yaṣṭim anuprayacchati: imāṃ dāraka yaṣṭim ākoṭayeti /
XXavsata_u:315: athāsau yaṣṭir ākoṭyamānā manojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ karoti, vividhāni ca ratnanidhānāni paśyati /
XXavsata_u:316: tasyaitad abhavat: mahān batāyaṃ vīryārambhe viśeṣo yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vīryam ārabheyeti /
XXavsata_u:317: sa śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāv avaghoṣaṇaṃ sārthavāham ātmānam udghoṣya ṣaḍvārān mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:318: tataḥ siddhayānapātreṇa mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān antarniveśane saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:320: atha bhagavān kusīdasya dārakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:321: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:325_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
XXavsata_u:325_1: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
XXavsata_u:328: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:330: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:331: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti /
XXavsata_u:332: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:334_0: tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino
XXavsata_u:334_1: brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
XXavsata_u:334_2: apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
XXavsata_u:334_3: sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:337: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:338: AVŚ_3.2 yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:340: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:341: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante /
XXavsata_u:352: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante //
XXavsata_u:353: atha ca tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:365: AVŚ_3.5 tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā
XXavsata_u:372: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:373: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat /
XXavsata_u:374: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:375: paśyasy ānanda anena kusīdena dārakeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:377_0: eṣa ānanda kuśido dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca
XXavsata_u:378: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:379: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti //
XXavsata_u:380: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:383_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:383_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:384: śrāvastyām anyatamo mahāsārthavāho mahāsamudrād bhagnayānapātra āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:385: sa dvir api trir api svadevatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇo bhagnayānapātra evāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:387: sa imāṃ cintām āpede: ko me upāyaḥ svādyena dhanārjanaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:389: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvadevaprativiśiṣṭataraḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahādharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ,
XXavsata_u:390: yanv aham idānīm asya nāmnā punar api mahāsamudram avatareyam* /
XXavsata_u:391: siddhayānapātras tv āgaccheyaṃ ced upārdhena dhanenāsya pūjāṃ kuryām iti //
XXavsata_u:393: sa evaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ punar api mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:394: buddhānubhāvena ca ratnadvīpaṃ saṃprāpya mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasvastinā svagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:395: sa mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya bhāṇḍaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:396: tasya nānāvicitrāṇi ratnāni dṛṣṭvā mahāṃllābha utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397: cintayati ca: mayā īdṛśānāṃ ratnānāṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya upārdhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:398: yanv aham etāni svasyāḥ patnyā āyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:399: tena kārṣāpaṇadvayena vikrīya bhagavato gandhaṃ dadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:402: atha bahagavāṃs tad rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yena sa dhūpa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya sarvāṃ ca śrāvastīṃ sphuritvā mahadabhrakūṭavad avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:403: tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:405: naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnair nābhyarcayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:406: atha tena sārthavāhena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarniveśane bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:408: tatas tāni ratnāni upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya mūrdhni bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapaś cāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:409: yan na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:410: yathāpi tad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena //
XXavsata_u:411: atha sārthavāho dviguṇajātaprasādas tatpratihāryadarśanān mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:412: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:416: atha bhagavāṃs tasya sārthavāhasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāviṣkārṣīt /

XXavsata_u:484_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:484_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:485: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatiḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:487: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:488: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:491: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā vaḍika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān pitā /
XXavsata_u:492: vaḍiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:493: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:495: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ pañcavarṣo ṣaḍvarṣo vā, tadā gurau bhaktiṃ kṛtvā sarvaśāstrāṇi adhītāni /
XXavsata_u:497: tad anantaraṃ tasya vaḍikasya kiṃcit pūrvajanmakṛtakarmavipākena śarīre kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ patitam iti duḥkhī bhūtaś cintāparaḥ sthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:499: yad idaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama śarīre jātam* /
XXavsata_u:500_0: tasya pitāpi putrasyedaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahadudvignaḥ putrātyayaśaṅkhayā
XXavsata_u:500_1: dīnamānasaḥ śokāśruvyāptavadanas tvaritaṃ vaidyam āhūya tasya putrasya rogaṃ darśayati: ko rogaḥ,
XXavsata_u:502: kena hetunā mama putrasya dehe jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:503: tataḥ sa vaidyas tasya rogacihnaṃ dṛṣṭvā cikitsāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:504: tathāpi tasya rogaśāntir na bhavati, punar vṛddhir bhavati /
XXavsata_u:505: pitā putrasya rogaṃ vṛddhaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśyaṃ putro mariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:506: yad vaidyenāpi cāsya rogasya cikitsituṃ na śakyate,
XXavsata_u:508: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'pi putrasya cintā jātā /
XXavsata_u:510: sa dārako rogī bhūto 'śakyo 'pi vadituṃ kathaṃcit pitaraṃ babhāṣe: mā tāta sāhasam* /
XXavsata_u:512: mamātyayāśaṅkayā mā bhūs tvam api mādṛśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:513: mama nāmnā devānāṃ pūjāṃ kuru, dānaṃ dehi /
XXavsata_u:515: sa gṛhapatir iti putrasya vaca ākarṇya sarvadevebhyaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:519: sarvadeveṣu pūjā kṛtā, dāno 'pi dattaḥ pitrā mama, tathāpi svasthā na bhavati /
XXavsata_u:520: tatas tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya buddhaṃ namaskāraṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:522_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:522_5: trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:523_0: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ
XXavsata_u:523_2: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:530: AVŚ_6.1 apy evātikramed velāṃ sāgaro makarālayaḥ /
XXavsata_u:531: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //

XXavsata_u:534: kalpasahasraparibhāvitāś ca maitryaṃśava utsṛṣṭāḥ, yair asya spṛṣṭamātraṃ śarīraṃ prahlāditam* /
XXavsata_u:537: atha vaḍikaḥ śreṣṭhiputro labdhaprasādo 'dhigatasamāśvāsa āha: praviśatu bhagavān,

XXavsata_u:541: niṣadya bhagavān vaḍikam uvāca: kiṃ te vaḍika bādhata iti /
XXavsata_u:542: vaḍika uvāca: kāyikaṃ ca me duḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ
XXavsata_u:545: tato 'sya bhagavatā sarvasatveṣu maitryupadiṣṭā: ayaṃ te cetasikasya pratipakṣa iti /
XXavsata_u:547: aho bata śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānayed iti /
XXavsata_u:548: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānīya bhagavate dattavān* /
XXavsata_u:549: bhagavatā ca svapāṇinā gṛhītvā vaḍikāya dattā: iyaṃ te kāyikasya duḥkhasya paridāhaśamanīti //

XXavsata_u:554: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena yathaivāhaṃ bhagavatā anuttareṇa vaidyarājena cikitsitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:555: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,

XXavsata_u:572_0: tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino
XXavsata_u:572_1: brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
XXavsata_u:572_2: apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
XXavsata_u:572_3: sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:575: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:576: AVŚ_6.3 yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:578: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:579: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante /
XXavsata_u:591: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante //

XXavsata_u:633: sa kretukāmo yāvad anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ pradeśam anuprataḥ //
XXavsata_u:635: tataḥ parasparaṃ vardhamānau yāvac chatasahasraṃ vardhitavantau /
XXavsata_u:636: athārāmikasyaitad abhavat*: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir acañcalaḥ sthirasatvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:638: tena saṃśayajātena sa tīrthikābhiprasannaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛsṭaḥ: kasyārthe bhavān evaṃ vardhata iti /
XXavsata_u:639: sa āha: ahaṃ bhagavato nārāyaṇasyārthe iti //
XXavsata_u:640: anāthapiṇḍada āha: ahaṃ bhagavato buddhasyārthe iti /
XXavsata_u:641: ārāmika āha: ka eṣa buddho nāmeti? tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena vistareṇāsya buddhaguṇā ākhyātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:642: tata ārāmiko 'nāthapiṇḍadam āha: gṛhapate ahaṃ svayam eva taṃ bhagavantam abhyarcayiṣya iti //
XXavsata_u:643: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir ārāmikam ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:644_0: dadarśārāmiko buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā

XXavsata_u:951: śrutvā ca caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ rājānam ajātaśatruṃ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:952: atha rājñā ajātaśatruṇā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:954: rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhīto bhagnaḥ parājitaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛta ekarathena śrāvastīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:957: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śokāgaraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:958: tatra ca śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:959: tena śrutaṃ yathā rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhagnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ, ekaratheneha praviṣṭa iti /
XXavsata_u:960: śrutvā ca punar yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:961: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ca (Speyer: uvāca)
XXavsata_u:963: ahaṃ devasya tāvat suvarṇam anuprayacchāmi, yena devaḥ punar api yatheṣṭapracāraṇaṃ kariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:965: yatropaviṣṭaḥ puruṣa utthitaṃ puruṣaṃ na paśyati,
XXavsata_u:967: atha rājñā prasenajitkauśalyena svaviṣaye carapuruṣāḥ samantata utsṛṣṭāḥ: śṛṇuta janapravādān iti /
XXavsata_u:968: yāvaj jetavane dvau mallāv anyonyaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutaḥ: asti kesarī nāma saṃgrāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:969: tatra ye kātarāḥ puruṣās te saṃgrāmaśirasi sthāpyante,
XXavsata_u:971: ye utkṛṣṭāḥ śūrapuruṣās te pṛṣṭhata iti /
XXavsata_u:973: śrutvā ca rājā prasenajit kauśalas tathā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca rājānam ajātaśatrum abhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:974: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena rājño 'jātaśatror vaidehīputrasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:976: rājānam apy ajātaśatruṃ vaidehīputraṃ jitaṃ bhītabhagnaparājitaṃ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaṃ jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā ekarathe 'bhiropya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /

XXavsata_u:979: ayaṃ hi bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur dīrgharātram avairasya me vairī,
XXavsata_u:981: na cecchāmy enaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayitum*, yasmād vayasyaputro 'yaṃ bhavati /
XXavsata_u:983: muñca mahārājety uktvā bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:984: AVŚ_10.1 jayo vairaṃ prasavati duḥkhaṃ śete parājitaḥ /

XXavsata_u:988: yanv aham enaṃ vareṇa pravārayeyam iti /

XXavsata_u:3425: ity uktamātre maitrakanyakasya bodhisatvasya tac cakraṃ saptatālamātraṃ mūrdhni udgamyākāśe sthitam* /

XXavsata_u:3596: sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ cārāmamārgaparyantaṃ saṃmārjya bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ śrotum ekānte niṣaṇṇā ādarayuktāḥ //

XXavsata_u:3598: tena śrutaṃ yathā bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayam eva jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:3599: bhagavatā deśitān saṃmārjane pañcāsnuśaṃsān upaśrutya vipratisārībhūtaḥ iti cintitavān:
XXavsata_u:3600: kimarthaṃ mayā bhagavato vihāre tasmin puṇyakṣetre,
XXavsata_u:3603_3: aviditaprabhāve pāpācārāṇām alabdhāgamane pāpamitrahastagatānām amanāpajāte śraddhāvigatānāṃ
XXavsata_u:3603_4: tyāgadharmarahitānām adṛṣṭacintitabhāvane duḥśīlānāṃ kuvṛttinām amanogamane dayābhāvavirahitānāṃ
XXavsata_u:3603_7: duṣprajñānāṃ kubuddhilabdhajñānāntarāṇām aprāptāgamanabhāve dātṝṇām atīva manorathakṛte
XXavsata_u:3605_0: ādarāgamanalabdhe vīryārabdhānāṃ nityānugamanaprāpte dhyānaratānām ālīnabhūvane prajñādhāriṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:3605_1: prabodhaprakāśāparityaktakṣetre etādṛśe buddhavikrīḍite vihāre saṃmārṣṭuṃ cittākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3606: na punaḥ kadāpi mayā tathā kṣamaṃ kartum* /
XXavsata_u:3607: iti niścitya punas tasyaitad abhavat: yatra bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:3611: tena bhikṣavaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ: ka eṣa iti /
XXavsata_u:3613: anāthapiṇḍado bhadanta bhagavato lajjāyamānarūpo 'patrāpyaparigatahṛdayo necchati bhagavataḥ sakāśam atropariṣṭāt pādanyāsenopasaṃkramitum*,
XXavsata_u:3614: yatra nāma bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:3618: kasmāt? saddharmagauravā hi buddhā bhagavantaḥ, dharmo hy arhatāṃ gurur iti /
XXavsata_u:3619: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gāthābhigītena gāyan yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3620: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastād ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmakathāśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:3621: tato bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3622: so 'nekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ saṃprakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:3623: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:3624: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dharme sādarajātaḥ sagauravajāto dharmasyaiva varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:3625: paśya bhadanta yāvad dharmaratnasyāmī bhājanahūtaḥ satvā ādareṇa sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ,
XXavsata_u:3628_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgadveṣamoho 'tha parimukto
XXavsata_u:3629: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair dharmahetoḥ svajīvitasyāpi parityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3630: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:3631_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
XXavsata_u:3631_1: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:3633: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:3634: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:3635: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā devī satvavatī saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:3636: dohadaś cāsyāḥ samutpannaḥ: subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇuyām iti /
XXavsata_u:3639: ta ūcuḥ: deva asya satvasyānubhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:3640: tatas tena rājā saubhāṣaṇikasyārthe suvarṇapiṭako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
XXavsata_u:3644: yāvat paripūrṇair navabhir māsaiḥ sā devī prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:3645: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3646: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatv asya dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:3648: yasmād ayaṃ dārako 'jāta eva subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhāṣitagaveṣī nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:3650: subhāṣitagaveṣī dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:3651: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:3653: yadā krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttas tadāpi subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate, na ca labhate //
XXavsata_u:3654: sa pitur atyayād rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ amātyānām ājñāpayati: subhāṣitena me grāmaṇyaḥ prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:3656: tatas tair amātyaiḥ sakale jambūdvīpe hiraṇyapiṭakāḥ subhāṣitahetoḥ saṃdarśitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3659: tataḥ sa rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor utkaṇṭhati paritapyati //
XXavsata_u:3662: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ rājānaṃ mīmāṃseyeti /
XXavsata_u:3663: atha śakro devānām indro guhyakarūpadhārī bhūtvā vikṛtakaracaraṇanayano rājñaḥ purastād gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:3664: AVŚ_38.1 dharmaṃ caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* /
XXavsata_u:3665: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃl loke paratra ca //
XXavsata_u:3667: taṃ guhyakam uvāca: brūhi brūhi guhyaka tāvan me, etāṃ gāthāṃ śroṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:3668: tato guhyako rājānam uvāca: yadi yad bravīmi tan me kariṣyasi,
XXavsata_u:3669: evam aham api yadājñāpayiṣyasi, tat kariṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:3671: guhyaka uvāca: saptāhorātrāṇi khadirakāṣṭhair agnikhadāṃ tāpayitvā tatra yady ātmānam utsrakṣyasi,
XXavsata_u:3673: tacchravaṇāc ca rājā prītamanās taṃ guhyakam uvāca: evam astv iti /
XXavsata_u:3674: tato rājñā guhyakaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam* saptame divase rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor agnikhadāyām ātmānam utsrakṣyati /
XXavsata_u:3676: tato 'nekeṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gaganataleṣu cānekeṣu devatāśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu bodhisatvasyādhyāśayaśuddhitām avagamyādbhutabhāvaṃ ca draṣṭum ihāvatasthuḥ /
XXavsata_u:3677: atha sa guhyaka ākāśam utpatya bodhisatvam uvāca: kriyatāṃ mahārāja yathāpratijñātam iti /
XXavsata_u:3678: tato rājā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya amātyān naigamajānapadāṃś ca kṣamayitvā janakāyaṃ cāśvāsya agnikhadāsamīpam upagamya imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:3682: eṣā cāgnikhadā bhaviṣyati śubhā puṇyānubhāvān mama
XXavsata_u:3684: ity uktvā bodhisatvas tasyām agnikhadāyāṃ patitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3686: tataḥ śakro devānām indras tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā yakṣarūpam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:3687: AVŚ_38.3 dharma caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* /
XXavsata_u:3688: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete loke 'smiṃ ca paratra //
XXavsata_u:3689: atha bodhisatvena tāṃ gāthām udgṛhītvā suvarṇapatreṣv abhilikhya kṛtsne jambudvīpe grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhāniṣu paryaṭitā //
XXavsata_u:3690: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ sa /
XXavsata_u:3691: tadāpi me subhāṣitaśravaṇahetoḥ svajīvitaṃ parityaktaṃ prāg evedānīm* /
XXavsata_u:3693: yad dharmaṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3694: dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3696: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:3699_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:3699_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:3700: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:3703_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:3704: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya pṛthivyāṃ lekhāṃ niṣkṛṣya (Speyer: nikṛṣya)
XXavsata_u:3705: bhagavantam uvāca: bho gautama, na tāvad ut te lekhā laṅghayitavyā,
XXavsata_u:3708: tato bhagavān karmaṇām avipraṇāśasaṃdarśanārtham adattādānavairamaṇyārthaṃ ca indrakīla iva tasmin pradeśe sthitaḥ //
XXavsata_u:3709: eṣa ca śabdaḥ śrāvastyāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:3710: yathā kila bhagavān rājamārge 'nyatamena brāhmaṇena pañcānāṃ purāṇaśatānām arthaṃ vidhārita iti /
XXavsata_u:3711: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sahaśravaṇād evāmātyagaṇaparivṛtto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3712: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam idam avocat*: gacchatu bhagavān, ahaṃ pradāsyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:3713: na mahārāja tvayaitāni dātavyāni, api tv anyenaitāni dātavyānīti /
XXavsata_u:3714: tathā viśākhā mṛgāramātā ṛṣidattapurāṇau sthapatī śakrabrahmādayo devā vaiśravaṇaprabhṛtayaś catvāro lokapālā hiraṇyasuvarṇam upādāya bhagavantam upasṛptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3715: tān api bhagavān uvāca: na bhavadbhir etāni dātavyānīti /
XXavsata_u:3717: sa hiraṇyasuvarṇasya helāṃ pūrayitvā upari pañca purāṇaśatāni datvā bhagavantam upagataḥ: bhagavan*,
XXavsata_u:3719: bhagavān āha: gṛhapate tvayā etāni dātavyāni /
XXavsata_u:3721: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sā suvarṇahelā brāhmaṇāya dattā //
XXavsata_u:3722: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarājikā ca parṣat sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:3723: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena brāhmaṇena bhagavān vidhārito 'nāthapiṇḍadena ca kārṣāpaṇā dattāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3724: kutaś ca prabhṛti bhagavān asmai dhārayata iti /
XXavsata_u:3725: bhagavān āha: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:3726: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye /

XXavsata_u:3733: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:3734: AVŚ_39.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy kalpakoṭiśatair api /

XXavsata_u:3762: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /

XXavsata_u:3767: upasaṃkramya dakṣinena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pāde pādam ādhāya alokasaṃjño smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvan //

XXavsata_u:3809: mahatāṃ caraṇācāryāṇām*: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante,
XXavsata_u:3811: tasya cādya bhagavato gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /

XXavsata_u:3822: imāṃ ca punar āyuṣmatā ānandasya subhadreṇa parivrājakenā sārdham antarākathāṃ viprakṛtām aśrauṣīd bhagavān divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa /
XXavsata_u:3823: śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat: alam ānanda /
XXavsata_u:3826: ayaṃ me paścimo bhaviṣyati anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:3827: ayaṃ ca me caramo bhaviṣyati sākṣācchrāvakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānām*,
XXavsata_u:3829: atha subhadra parivrājako bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3830: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3831: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:3840: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:3846: AVŚ_40.2 śīlaṃ samādhiś caraṇaṃ ca vidyā
XXavsata_u:3850: yasya subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo nopalabhyate, prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:3851: dvitīyas tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:3852: yasmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatropalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:3854: asmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:3855: iha prathamaḥ śramaṇa upalabhyate, iha dvitīyaḥ, iha trtīyaḥ, iha caturthaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3856: na santi ito bahiḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā /
XXavsata_u:3857: śūnyāḥ parapravādāḥ śramaṇair vā brāhmaṇair vā /
XXavsata_u:3859: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe subhadrasya parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
XXavsata_u:3860_0: atha subhadraḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas
XXavsata_u:3860_2: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:3861: lābhā bhadanta ānandena sulabdhā yad bhagavatā ānando mahācāryeṇa mahācāryāntevāsikābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3862: api tu asmākam api syur lābhāḥ sulabdhā yad vayaṃ labhemahi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:3864: ayaṃ bhadanta subhadraḥ parivrājaka ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:3867: saiva tasyāyuṣmataḥ pravrajyābhūt sopasaṃpat, sa bhikṣubhāvaḥ //
XXavsata_u:3868: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:3869: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:3870: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya pravedayati: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
XXavsata_u:3871: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nānyam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
XXavsata_u:3873: athāyuṣmataḥ subhadrasyārhatvaprāptasya vimuktisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata etad abhavat*:
XXavsata_u:3874: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ śāstāraṃ parinirvāpayantaṃ paśyeyam* /
XXavsata_u:3876: tatrāyuṣmān subhadraḥ prathamataraṃ parinirvṛtaḥ, tataḥ paścād bhagavān* //

XXavsata_u:3882: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta,
XXavsata_u:3883: yad ayaṃ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavatā chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpita iti /

XXavsata_u:3891: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ mṛgayūthapaḥ prativasati anekamṛgasahasraparivāraḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
XXavsata_u:3892: tac ca mṛgayūthaṃ lubdhakena vicārya rājñe niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:3893: tato rājñā caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena nirgatya tan mṛgayūthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃkaṭīkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:3894: tato yūthapater etad abhavat*: yady aham idānīm imān na rakṣiṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:3897: katamena pradeśenāsya mṛgakulasya niḥsaraṇaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:3898: sa paśyati tasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ nadīṃ vahamānām* /
XXavsata_u:3899: sā ca nadī ahāryahāriṇī śīghrasrotāḥ, te ca mṛgā durbalāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3900: tato yūthapatiḥ sahasā tāṃ nadīm avatīrya madhye sthitvā śabdam udīrayati: āgacchantu bhavantaḥ,
XXavsata_u:3901: etasmāt kūlād utplutya mama pṛṣṭe pādān sthāpayitvā paratra kūle pratitiṣṭhata /
XXavsata_u:3902: anenopāyena jīvitaṃ vaḥ paśyāmi, ato 'nyathā maraṇam iti /
XXavsata_u:3906: na cāsya vyavasāyo nivṛttaḥ tadgatakāruṇyo mṛgāṇām antike /
XXavsata_u:3911_0: tato yūthapatiś chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu iṣṭajīvitam agaṇayitvā
XXavsata_u:3911_1: kūlam uttīrya mṛgaśāvakaṃ pṛṣṭham adhirohya nadīm uttārya kūle sthāpayitvā taṃ mṛgagaṇam
XXavsata_u:3911_2: uttīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā maraṇakāle praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:3912: yathā me ime mṛgā ayaṃ ca mārgaśāvaka iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāḥ,
XXavsata_u:3914: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya etān saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:3915: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mṛgapatir āsīt*, ahaṃ sa /
XXavsata_u:3918: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:3919: kāni bhadanta subhadreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena paścimaḥ sākṣācchrāvakāṇām iti /
XXavsata_u:3920: bhagavān āha: subhadreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:3925: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:3926: AVŚ_40.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:3927: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:3928_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
XXavsata_u:3928_1: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
XXavsata_u:3928_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:3929: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:3934: sa svādhīnaṃ mokṣaṃ manyamāno na vyāyacchate /
XXavsata_u:3936: bhagavāṃś ca kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ paścimaśayanopagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:3937: aśokaś ca bhikṣur aśokasyādhastāt pratisaṃlīno babhūva /
XXavsata_u:3938: atha yā devatā tasminn aśokavṛkṣe vyuṣitā,
XXavsata_u:3939: sā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttā /
XXavsata_u:3940: tasya rudantyā aśrubindavo 'śokasya kāye nipatituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:3941: athāśoka ūrdhvamukhas tāṃ devatāṃ rudantīm āha: kimarthaṃ devate rudyata iti /
XXavsata_u:3943: adya rātryā madhyame yāme bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:3944: athāśoko devatāvacanam upasṛtya marmaviddha iva pracalitavān* /
XXavsata_u:3952: apakṛṣṭatvād adhvano na śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
XXavsata_u:3953: devatovāca: yadi punar ahaṃ bhavantaṃ bhagavatsakāśam upanayeyam*, kiṃ śakyam iti /
XXavsata_u:3954: aśoka uvāca: tathā hi me buddhiḥ paripakvā,
XXavsata_u:3955: yathā sahadarśanād eva bhagavataḥ śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
XXavsata_u:3956: tato devatayā aśoko bhagavatsakāśam ṛddhyanubhāvān nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3958: prasādajātasya ca bhagavatā kāśyapena tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ yacchravaṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:3959: prathamataraṃ cāyuṣmān aśokaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ, tato bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ //
XXavsata_u:3960: tataḥ sā devatā āyuṣmato 'śokasya parinirvāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:3961: cintayati ca: yaḥ kaścid anenāyuṣmatā viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ, sarvaḥ sa mām āgamya /
XXavsata_u:3962: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:3963: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:3964: tasyāham eva paścimaśayanopagatasya caramaḥ sākṣācchravakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānāṃ bhaveyam*,
XXavsata_u:3967: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau devatā, ayaṃ sa subhadraḥ /
XXavsata_u:3968: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kalyāṇamitratā vihariṣyāmaḥ kalyāṇsahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:3969: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3972: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi:
XXavsata_u:3973: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:3974: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:3977: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:3978: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:3981: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:3982: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3984: māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇamitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatāyāḥ parimucyante,
XXavsata_u:3986: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:3987: na pāpasahāyatā na pāpamitratā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:3989: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:3993: guḍaśālā ca bhaktaṃ ca toyaṃ varcaghaṭena ca /
XXavsata_u:3994: koliko hy uttaraś cāpi jātyandhaḥ śreṣṭhir eva ca /
XXavsata_u:3995: putro jāmbālakaś caiva vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:3998_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:3998_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:4002: , yāvan narakatiryakpretebhya ekasatvam api na mocayāva iti /
XXavsata_u:4003: tatas tāv āyuṣmatau kālena kālaṃ kadācin narakacārikāṃ carataḥ, kadācit tiryakpretacārikāṃ carataḥ /
XXavsata_u:4004: tau tatra satvānāṃ vividhayātanābhyāhatānām asatpralāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayataḥ /
XXavsata_u:4006: tatas tau tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurutaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4009_0: yāvad apareṇa samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ carann adrākṣīt pretaṃ
XXavsata_u:4010: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanām anubhavantam*,
XXavsata_u:4011: yena yenoccāraprasrāvabhūmis tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantam* /
XXavsata_u:4013: kiṃ te bhoḥ karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:4014: preta āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:4018: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:4020: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4021: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ
XXavsata_u:4024: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: ehi maudgalyāyana svāgataṃ te,
XXavsata_u:4026: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4027: tatrāhaṃ pretam adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhaṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannaṃ durgandhaṃ paramadurgandham* / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:4034: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* // iti
XXavsata_u:4035: bhagavān āha: pāpakārī maudgalyāyana sa pretaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4036: icchasi tasya karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:4037: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:4038: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana rājagṛhe nagare 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:4040: asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:4042: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:4046: śreṣṭhinā ca sa pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:4047: dṛṣṭvā śreṣṭhinā uktaḥ: kenāryasya prayojanam iti /
XXavsata_u:4049: tatas tena gṛhapatinā bhṛtakapuruṣasyājñā dattā āryasyekṣurasaṃ prayaccheti /
XXavsata_u:4050: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena bahir yānāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4051: atha tasya puruṣasya parakīye dravye mātsaryam utpannam*: yady aham asya rasaṃ dāsye,
XXavsata_u:4053: tena aniṣṭagatitrayaprapātanamreṇa sarvābhimatagatidvayanirākariṣṇunā atyantadūrāpagatenāryadharmebhyaḥ pāpaṃ cittam utpādya sa pratyekabuddha uktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:4057: asamanvāhṛtya arhacchrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti /
XXavsata_u:4058: hīnadīnānukampitayā bhṛtyapuruṣo 'yam asyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti tat pātram upanāmitam* /
XXavsata_u:4059: tato 'sau durācāro nirghṛṇahṛdayas tad gṛhītvā pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā prasrāveṇā pūrayitvā upari ikṣurasenācchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāyānupradadau /
XXavsata_u:4060: tena saṃlakṣitam* sa cintayati: bahv anena tapasvinā pāpaṃ kṛtam api /
XXavsata_u:4064: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhṛtakapuruṣa āsīt', ayaṃ sa pretaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4065: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:4066: idānīm api pretabhūtaḥ prakṛṣṭataraṃ duḥkham anubhavati /
XXavsata_u:4067: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye pretasya /
XXavsata_u:4068: iti hi maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4071: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:4075: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:4078_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:4078_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:4079: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ anyatarasmin vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya /
XXavsata_u:4080: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretyāḥ śabdam ārtasvaraṃ krandantyāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4081: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāyā bhaktaṃ mārgantyāḥ:
XXavsata_u:4084: tataḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca:
XXavsata_u:4085: kiṃ te pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāny anubhaviṣyasīti /
XXavsata_u:4086: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:4087: bhagavantam etam arthaṃ pṛccha, sa te asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:4089: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:4091: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4092: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:4093: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: ehi maudgalyāyana svāgataṃ te,
XXavsata_u:4095: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4096: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ nagnām ārtasvaraṃ krandantīṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:4102: AVŚ_42.3 bubhukṣayā pipāsayā krāntā vyasanapīḍitā / *{sonst: pipāsayā klānta vyasanapīḍitā}*
XXavsata_u:4104: AVŚ_42.4 kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:4105: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // iti
XXavsata_u:4106: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī maudgalyāyana sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:4107: icchasi tasyā karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:4108: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:4109_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana atīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo
XXavsata_u:4109_1: nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
XXavsata_u:4110: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:4111: tasyāṃ ca vārāṇasyām anyatamā gṛhapatipatnī matsariṇī kuṭukuñcikā āgṛhītapariṣkārā kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati,
XXavsata_u:4114: yāvad anyataraḥ piṇḍapātikas tasyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4116: cittaṃ ca pradūṣya imāṃ cintām āpede: yady aham asya satkāraṃ kariṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:4118: tatas tayā pāpakāriṇyā aniṣṭaṃ paralokabhayam avigaṇayya sa bhikṣur upanimantrya dvāraṃ baddhvā bhaktacchedaṃ kāritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4119: bahu ca paribhāṣyoktaḥ: iyaṃ te bhikṣo satkriyā /
XXavsata_u:4121: sā tena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:4124: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, te tasyāḥ pretyā iti //
XXavsata_u:4126: āttamanasa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:4249: iti bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana ye 'smākaṃ jñātayo rājagṛhe prativasanti,
XXavsata_u:4250: teṣām asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayitvā cāsmākaṃ pretayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:4252: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātigṛhebhyaś cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopamantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4253: pretānāṃ ca niveditam*: śvo bhagavān sabhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4255: jñātīnām apy ārocitam*: bhavadbhir āgantavyaṃ tatra jñātibhojane /
XXavsata_u:4257: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svayam evodyukto bhojanaṃ pratijāgaritum* //
XXavsata_u:4258: atha prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āhāre sajjīkṛte gaṇḍīdeśakāle saṃprāpte tān pretān na paśyati /
XXavsata_u:4259: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano divyena cakṣuṣā tān pretān samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4263: tato yāvad asya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate, tato vyavalokayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4265: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvigno bhagavate nivedayāmāsa: bhagavan,
XXavsata_u:4267: bhagavān āha: ayaṃ maudgalyāyana mā khedam āpadyasva /
XXavsata_u:4274: tato gaṇḍyām ākoṭitāyāṃ sarvo bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4275: pretajñātayo 'nye ca kautūhalyābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ pretadarśanotsukāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4276: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā darśitaṃ yathā pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhuñjānaṃ paśyanti,
XXavsata_u:4277: smṛtiṃ ca pratilabhante: jñātayo asmad arthe buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayantīti /
XXavsata_u:4278: tato bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:4279: AVŚ_44.1 ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:4282: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:4283: yāṃ śrutvā anekair prāṇiśatasahasrair mātsaryamalaṃ prahāya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:4284: te ca pretā bhagavati cittam abhiprasādya kālagatāḥ, praṇīteṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ //
XXavsata_u:4285: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:4287: paśyanti pretebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4289: atha pretapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syāt,
XXavsata_u:4291: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:4292_0: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ
XXavsata_u:4292_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmapuṇḍarīkamandāravādīnāṃ
XXavsata_u:4292_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā samantato venuvaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
XXavsata_u:4292_3: bhagavataṃ puṣpair ākīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:4293: atha bhagavān pretapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:4294: yāṃ śrutvā pretapūrvikair devaputrair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:4295: te labdhalābhā iva vaṇijo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraivāntarhitāḥ //
XXavsata_u:4303: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātīnām ārocitam* /
XXavsata_u:4304: te śrutvā paraṃ vismayam upagatā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsur bhūyaś ca satkāraṃ pracakrur iti /
XXavsata_u:4305: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam* /
XXavsata_u:4306: ete doṣā na bhavanti ye teṣāṃ pretānām iti //
XXavsata_u:4308: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:4312: rājagṛhe 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:4317: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:4318: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:4320: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:4321: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād uttare nakṣatre jātas tasmād bhavatūttara iti nāma /
XXavsata_u:4322: uttaro dārako unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4328: tasya bhagavatsaṃdarśanāt saddharmaśravaṇāc ca bhagavacchāsane prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4330: sa mātaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: amba anujānīhi māṃ bhagavacchāsaneṣu pravrajiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:4331: tato mātā kathayati: putra tvam ekaputrakaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4332: yāvad ahaṃ jīvāmi, tāvan na pravrajitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:4334: sa cottaro yat kiṃcid upārjayati tat sarvaṃ mātre 'nuprayacchati:
XXavsata_u:4336: sā cāsya mātā lubdhā kuṭukuñcikā matsariṇī āgṛhītapariṣkārā tān kārṣāpaṇān gopayitvā ye śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ piṇḍārthinas tad gṛhaṃ praviśanti,
XXavsata_u:4337: tān paribhāṣate: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣam aṭatheti /
XXavsata_u:4338: sā ca putraṃ visaṃvādayati: aham adya iyatāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojanaṃ prayacchāmīti //
XXavsata_u:4340: uttaraś ca mātṛviyogād dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4341_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:4342: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /

XXavsata_u:4345_1: parvatopamakukṣir ādīptā saṃprajvalitā ekajvālībhūtā ārtasvaraṃ kradantī āyuṣmantam
XXavsata_u:4346: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa sā pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca: kā tvam evaṃvidheti / pretī āha:
XXavsata_u:4347: AVŚ_46.1 ahaṃ te jananī snigdhā yayā jāto 'si putraka /
XXavsata_u:4349: AVŚ_46.2 pañcaviṃśati varṣāṇi yataḥ kālagatā hy aham* /
XXavsata_u:4351: AVŚ_46.3 saphalān vṛkṣān gacchāmi niṣphalā me bhavanti te /
XXavsata_u:4352: pūrṇāni sarāṃsi gacchāmi tāni śuṣkāṇi santi me //
XXavsata_u:4354: AVŚ_46.4 sukhaṃ bhadantasya hi vṛkṣamūlaṃ udakaṃ bhajate śītala bhājanesmim* /
XXavsata_u:4355: kṛpā janayitvā {janetvā} kṛpaṇāyai mahyaṃ dadasva toyaṃ tṛṣārtitāyai //
XXavsata_u:4356: tata uttaro mātaram uvāca: amba nanu purā tvaṃ mayā manuṣyabhūtā dānāni dāpitā, puṇyāni kāriteti /
XXavsata_u:4357: pretī āha: na mayā putraka mātsaryābhibhūtayā dānāni dattāni, puṇyāni vā kṛtāni /
XXavsata_u:4359: tad idānīṃ putraka jñātigṛhaṃ gatvā chandanabhikṣaṃ kṛtvā mama nāmnā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojaya,
XXavsata_u:4362: evaṃ pretayoner mama mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:4364: kiṃ tu tvayā buddhānte sthātavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:4365: pretī āha: putrakā, apatrape nagnā hriyānviteti /
XXavsata_u:4366: uttara āha: amba yadā pāpaṃ karoṣi, tadā nāpatrapitā /
XXavsata_u:4369: tata uttareṇa jñātigṛhebhyaś chandanabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4373: te tāṃ pretīṃ vikṛtāśrayāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ saṃvegam upagatāḥ bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsuḥ /
XXavsata_u:4374: tataḥ āyuṣmān uttaro buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pretyā nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:4375: bhagavāṃś ca pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa svayam eva dakṣiṇādeśanām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:4376: AVŚ_46.5 ito dānād dhi yat punyaṃ tat pretīm anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:4378: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tasyāḥ pretyā mahataś ca janakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:4382: tata āyuṣmatā uttareṇoktam*: amba asti te śaktiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4387: AVŚ_46.6 adyāpi te tiṣṭhati tac charīraṃ vivṛddhanirmāṃsatvagasthicarmam* /
XXavsata_u:4389: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa subahu paribhāṣya ekā yamalī labdhā /
XXavsata_u:4391: yena ca bhikṣuṇā saṃghamadhyāt sā yamalī krītā, tena mānavake sthāpitā /
XXavsata_u:4393: tatas tena bhikṣuṇā āyuṣmata uttarāya niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:4394: uttareṇa gatvā pretīṃ paribhāṣya punar apy ānīya dattā /
XXavsata_u:4395: evaṃ yāvat trir api tasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśād apahṛtā, āyuṣmatā cottareṇānīya dattā /
XXavsata_u:4396: bhikṣuṇā ca sā pāṭayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vilepanikāyāṃ
XXavsata_u:4400: ata eva mātsaryaṃ satvānāṃ viḍambanakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātsaryaprahāṇāya dhyāyitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:4401: tathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur yathā tasyāḥ pretyā iti //

XXavsata_u:4419: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:4420: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:4421: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nandakam idam avocat*: ehi nanadaka,
XXavsata_u:4424: nandaka āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4425: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśaromasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ durgandhāṃ śmaśānasadṛśīṃ kākair gṛdhraiḥ śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiś cābhidrutām*,

XXavsata_u:4435: AVŚ_47.4 kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /

XXavsata_u:4450: tatas tayā dānapatir gṛhebhyaḥ pravṛttakāni chandakāni # # # [The gap may be filled ou by ācchinnāni; Speyer:

XXavsata_u:4452: bhikṣavaś ca ye śīlavantaḥ, tān dṛṣṭvā nayane nimīlitavatī //

XXavsata_u:4477: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:4478: tasmai bhagavatā saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4479: pravrajitaś ca jñāto mahāpuṇyaḥ saṃvṛtto lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām* /
XXavsata_u:4480: sa gṛhītapariṣkāro labdhaṃ labdhaṃ saṃcayaṃ karoti, na tu sabrahmacāribhiḥ saha saṃvibhāgaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:4481: sa tena mātsaryeṇa sevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena pariṣkārādhyavasitaḥ kālagataḥ svake layane preteṣūpapannaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4482: tato 'sya sabrahmacāribhir muṇḍikāṃ gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya śarīrābhinirhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4483: tato 'sya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā vihāram āgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4484: tato layanadvāraṃ vimucya pātracīvaraṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4485: yāvat paśyanti taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtakaracaraṇanayanaṃ paramabībhatsāśrayaṃ pātracīvaram avaṣṭabhyāvasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:4486: tathāvikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ saṃvignā bhagavate niveditavantaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4487: tato bhagavāṃs tasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ śiṣyagaṇasyodvejanārthaṃ mātsaryasya cāniṣṭavipākasaṃdarśanārthaṃ bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4488_0: tato 'sau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:4494: sādhu mamāntike cittaṃ prasādaya, asmāc ca pariṣkārāc cittaṃ virāgaya /
XXavsata_u:4495: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti /
XXavsata_u:4496: tataḥ pretaḥ saṃghe pātracīvaraṃ niryātya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
XXavsata_u:4497: tato bhagavatā pretasya nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā:
XXavsata_u:4498: AVŚ_48.1 ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretam anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:4500: tataḥ sa preto bhagavati cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ pretamarddhikeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4501: tataḥ pretamaharddhikaś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitramauliḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras
XXavsata_u:4503_0: tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā
XXavsata_u:4503_1: sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
XXavsata_u:4504: bhagavatā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā prasādajātaḥ prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4508: kiṃ bhagavan asyām rātrau brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:4510: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4511: api sa pretaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pretamaharddhikeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4516: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, ye tasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pretabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:4519: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:4522_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:4522_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:4522_4: rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:4523: athāyuṣmān nāladaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:4524: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya pretacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4525: sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvatasāmantake pretīṃ dadarśa yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:4526: rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tādṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhūya putrasnehe saty api kṣutkṣāmatayā putrāṃs tān bhakṣayantīm* /
XXavsata_u:4527: tataḥ sthaviro nāladas tāṃ pṛṣṭavān: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti /
XXavsata_u:4528: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:4531: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:4533: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:4534: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
XXavsata_u:4537: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:4538: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nāladam idam avocat*: ehi nālada,
XXavsata_u:4541: nālada āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4542: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:4543: AVŚ_49.1 pañca putrān ahaṃ rātrau divā pañca tathāparān* /
XXavsata_u:4544: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptas tathāpi me // iti
XXavsata_u:4545: AVŚ_49.2 kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:4546: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // iti
XXavsata_u:4547: 500a bhagavān āha: pāpakārī nālada sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:4548: icchasi tasyāḥ karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:4549: tena hi nālada śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:4550: bhūtapūrvaṃ nālada atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām 'nyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:4552: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:4553: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato naiva putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:4554: sa kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham* /
XXavsata_u:4556: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:4557: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:4558: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4559: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:4560: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:4562: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4563: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:4568: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:4569: tasya devatārādhane 'pi sati na putro na duhitā //
XXavsata_u:4570: tasyaivaṃ buddhir utpannā: dvitīyāṃ bhāryām anayāmi /
XXavsata_u:4572: tena sadṛśāt kulād dvitīyā bhāryā ānītā /
XXavsata_u:4573: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:4574: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:4575: tayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā svāmine niveditam: diṣṭyā āryputra vardhase /
XXavsata_u:4577: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:4578: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udanayati:
XXavsata_u:4587: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:4588: idaṃ tayor yatrayatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:4589_0: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇair
XXavsata_u:4589_1: uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair
XXavsata_u:4590: hārārdhahāravirājitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:4591: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya //
XXavsata_u:4592: tatas tasyāḥ pūrvikāyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ prathamapatnyās tāṃ bahumānāl lālitāṃ (Speyer: laḍitaṃ)
XXavsata_u:4594: cintayanti: yady eṣā putraṃ janayiṣyati, niyataṃ māṃ bādhayiṣyati /
XXavsata_u:4596: kāmān khalu pratisevyamānasya (Speyer: pratisevamānasya) nāsti kiṃcit pāpaṃ karmācaraṇīyam iti /
XXavsata_u:4597: tayā aniṣṭagatiprapātanamugdhayā visrambham utpādya tathāvidhaṃ garbhaśātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattaṃ yena pītamātreṇaiva tasyās tapasvinyāḥ srasto garbhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4598: tatas tayā dvitīyapatnyā sarvajñātīn saṃnipātya sā prathamā patnī samanuyujyate:
XXavsata_u:4599: tvayā me visrambham utpādya śātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattam*,
XXavsata_u:4601: tato 'sau prathamapatnī jñātimadhye śapathaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā:
XXavsata_u:4602: yadi mayā garbhaśātanaṃ dravyam anupradattaṃ syāt*,
XXavsata_u:4603: ahaṃ pretī bhūtvā jātāñ jātān putrān bhakṣayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:4604: kiṃ manyase nālada yāsau śreṣṭhibhāryā, iyaṃ sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:4605: yat tayā īrṣyāprakṛtayā garbhaśātanaṃ dattaṃ tena preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:4607: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tān eva bhakṣayati /
XXavsata_u:4608: tasmāt tarhi te nālada vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4611: āttamanā āyuṣmān nālado 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:4614_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:4614_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:4615_0: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyām anyatarasyāṃ nagaraparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni prativasanti
XXavsata_u:4615_1: vāntāśāny ujjhitāśāni kheṭamūtropajīvīni pūyaśoṇitaviṣṭhāhārāṇi ghorāṇi prakṛtiduḥkhitāni ca / āha ca:
XXavsata_u:4621: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:4622: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:4624: tatas tena brāhmaṇena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4625: te kathayanti: yo 'yam udarastho dārakas tasyāyaṃ prabhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:4626: yāvad asau navānāṃ māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:4627: dārako jāto durvarṇo durdarśano avakoṭimako 'medhyamrakṣitagātro durgandhaś ca /
XXavsata_u:4628: tathāpy asau snehapāśānubaddhābhyāṃ paramabībhatso 'pi mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ saṃvardhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4629: so 'medhyasthāneṣv evābhiramate saṃkārakūṭe jambāle, keśāṃl luñcati, amedhyaṃ mukhe prakṣipati /
XXavsata_u:4630: tasya bālo jāmbāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā //
XXavsata_u:4631: yāvad asāv itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman pūraṇena kāśyapena dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4632: tasyaitad abhavat: yādṛśeṣu sthāneṣv ayam abhiramate, nūnam ayaṃ siddhapuruṣaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4634: sa tena pravrājito nagnaḥ paryaṭati satkriyāsu ca vartate /
XXavsata_u:4635: tatas tena paryaṭatā vaiśālīparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni dṛṣṭāni /
XXavsata_u:4636: sa pūrvakarmavipākasaṃbandhāt tāṃ nagaraparikhām avatīrya taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgamya samāgamya saṃmodate,
XXavsata_u:4638: yāvad apareṇa samayena jāmbālo dārakaḥ kvacit prayojanena vyākṣipto vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4640_0: dadṛśus te pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:4642: bhagavatā uktāḥ: kiṃ bhavatāṃ bādhata iti /
XXavsata_u:4643: te ūcuḥ: pipāsitāḥ smo bhagavann iti /
XXavsata_u:4644: tato bhagavatā pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo 'ṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya pañca dhārā utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4646: tatas te bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:4648: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:4653: atha pretapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syāt,
XXavsata_u:4655: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:4656_0: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ
XXavsata_u:4656_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:4656_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvāṃ kūṭāgāraśālāṃ udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ
XXavsata_u:4656_3: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:4659: dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:4660: yāṃ śrutvā pañcabhir devaputraśatair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam* /
XXavsata_u:4664: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturā yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ //
XXavsata_u:4665: atha jāmbālo nagaraparikhām āgatas tān pretān nādrākṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:4667: sa ca tān parimārgamāṇaḥ khedam āpanno na ca tān āsādayati //
XXavsata_u:4668: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:4669_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:4669_5: trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:4670: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:4671: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:4678: AVŚ_50.2 apy evātikramed velāṃ sāgaro makarālayaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4679: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:4680: tato bhagavāñ jāmbālasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:4681: yāvad anupūrveṇa piṇḍapātam aṭan vīthīm avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4682: jāmbālaś ca itas tato 'nvāhiṇḍamāno bhagavato 'grataḥ sthitaḥ /

XXavsata_u:4911: atha bhagavān brāhmaṇapūrvakasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:4912: yāṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:4914: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:4933: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // iti
XXavsata_u:4938: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4940: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
XXavsata_u:4944: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātryāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:4946: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:4947: api yo 'sāv ekaputro 'sya brāhmaṇasya putro 'lpāyuṣkaḥ kālagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:4948: sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:4950: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyaś ca svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
XXavsata_u:4951: atra cāntare sa brāhmaṇas tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ śmaśāne nirhṛtyotsaṅge kṛtvā karuṇakaruṇaṃ vilapan* kathayati:
XXavsata_u:4953: jñātayaḥ subahv api śokavinodanaṃ kurvaṇā na śaknuvanty utthāpayitum* /
XXavsata_u:4954: sa kākakuraraśvaśṛgālagṛdhraparivṛtaḥ prakīrṇakeśībhiḥ strībhir anugato mahājanakāyena codvīkṣyamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:4955: tato 'sya putro devabhūtaḥ pitaraṃ paridevamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ pituḥ śokavinodanārtham ṛṣiveṣadhāriṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya śmaśānasamīpe pañcatapāvasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4956: atha sa brāhmaṇas tam ṛṣiṃ papraccha: bho maharṣe anena tapasā kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:4958: sauvarṇaś ca me rathaḥ syān nānāratnavicitraḥ,
XXavsata_u:4961: so 'haṃ taṃ ratham abhiruhyemāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍeyeti /
XXavsata_u:4963: AVŚ_52.5 yadi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tapiṣyasi nirantaram* /
XXavsata_u:4964: na lapsyase 'pi tat sthānaṃ paramatapasāpi hi //
XXavsata_u:4966: tvaṃ ca punar anena mṛtakuṇapenāśucinā paramadurgandhena śavena kāṣṭhabhūtena kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:4967: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha: priyo me ekaputrakaḥ kālagataḥ, taṃ prārthaya iti / ṛṣir āha:
XXavsata_u:4969: AVŚ_52.6 yadi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ rodiṣyasi nirantaram* /
XXavsata_u:4970: na lapsyase 'pi taṃ putraṃ ruditena hi kiṃ tava //
XXavsata_u:4971: tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya bhūtam ṛṣivacanam avagatya prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4973: tata ṛṣis taṃ veṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā pitaram āha:
XXavsata_u:4974: ahaṃ te sa ekaputrako bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:4977: ehi tvaṃ tāta buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha, apy eva tvam api saṃsārasamatikrāmaṃ kuryā iti //
XXavsata_u:4978: atha sa brāhmaṇo mṛtaśarīram apahāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4979: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:4981: yāṃ śrutvā tena brāhmaṇeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:4982: sa labdhodayo labdhalābho bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4983: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhagavan,
XXavsata_u:4984: yāvad anena devaputreṇāyaṃ pitā śokaṃ vinodya satyadarśane pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
XXavsata_u:4985: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad anenaitarhi dṛṣṭasatyena pitā paritrātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4986: yat tv anena atīte 'dhvani pṛthagjanena satā yāvat trir api pitā jīvitād vyavaropyamāṇaḥ paritrātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4987: tac chruṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:4988: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pāradārikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:4992: tataḥ putreṇa yāvat trir api rājānaṃ vijñāpya iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:4993: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena pāradārika āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:4996: bhikṣava ūcuḥ: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena pitāputrābhyāṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:4997: bhagavān āha: kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe upāsakabhūtābhyāṃ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5001: śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti nirvāṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /

XXavsata_u:5011: yāvad anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikā sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya śrāvastīṃ praviśati /

XXavsata_u:5017: bhagavataḥ kṛtopasthānā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā yāvat sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtā devasamitim upasaṃkrāntā //
XXavsata_u:5018: tasmiṃś ca kāle śakro devendraḥ sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devagaṇasya madhye buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
XXavsata_u:5020: dadarśa śakro devendras tāṃ devakanyāṃ sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtām uttaptakuśalamūlām* /
XXavsata_u:5022: AVŚ_53.1 gātraṃ kena vimṛṣṭakāñcananibhaṃ padmotpalābhaṃ tava
XXavsata_u:5023: gātraśrīr atulā kṛteyam iha te dehāt prabhā niḥsṛtā /

XXavsata_u:5081: kiṃ bhadanta imāṃ rātriṃ brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ?

XXavsata_u:5089: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5090: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /

XXavsata_u:5096_1: ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam
XXavsata_u:5096_2: akhilam akaṇṭakam ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati /

XXavsata_u:5098: tadā rātriṃ bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmati sārdham antaḥpureṇa /
XXavsata_u:5099_0: atha rājā bimbisāro 'pareṇa samayena saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
XXavsata_u:5100: tatra cāntaḥpurikābhī rājā vijñaptaḥ: deva vayaṃ na śaknumo 'hanyahani bhagavantam upasaṃkramitum* /
XXavsata_u:5101: tat sādhu devo 'sminn antaḥpure tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed* yatra vayam asakṛtpuṣpair gandhair mālyair vilepanaiś chatrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāmeti /
XXavsata_u:5103: dīyatām asmabhyaṃ keśanakhaṃ yena vayaṃ tathāgatastūpam antaḥpuramadhye pratiṣṭhāpayāma iti /
XXavsata_u:5105: rājñā bimbisāreṇa mahatā satkāreṇāntaḥpurasahāyena tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpo 'ntaḥpuramadhye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5107: yadā punā rājñā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5111: kriyākāraś ca kārito na kenacit tathāgatastūpe kārāḥ kartavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:5113: tadā tatra keśanakhastūpe na kaścit saṃmārjanaṃ dīpadhūpapuṣpadānaṃ vā kurute /
XXavsata_u:5114: tato 'ntaḥpurikā keśanakhastūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ rājānaṃ ca bimbisāram anusmṛtya karuṇakaruṇaṃ roditum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:5115: hā kaṣṭaṃ dharmarājaviyogād vayaṃ puṇyāt prahīṇā iti /
XXavsata_u:5117: sā svakaṃ jīvitam agaṇayitvā buddhaguṇāṃś cānusmṛtya keśanakhastūpaṃ saṃmṛjya dīpamālām akārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:5118: yāvad ajātaśatrur upariprasādatalagataḥ tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha kim idam iti /
XXavsata_u:5119: yāvad anyayā kathitam*: śrīmatyā keśanakhastūpe dīpamālā kṛteti /
XXavsata_u:5120: tataḥ śrīmatīm āhūya kathayati: kim arthaṃ rājaśāsanam atikramasīti /
