XXavsata_u:5434: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:5437: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:5441_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:5441_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:5442: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5443: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā vijñāpayati:
XXavsata_u:5444: yat khalu deva jānīyāś ciradṛṣṭo 'smābhir bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:5448: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti?
XXavsata_u:5449: anāthapiṇḍada uvāca: śrutaṃ me deva bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagata iti //
XXavsata_u:5450: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena anāthapiṇḍadādyaiś ca paurajānapadāmātyair anyatamaḥ puruṣo dūtyenāhūyoktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5453: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
XXavsata_u:5454: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha alpātaṅkaṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:5455: evaṃ ca vada: rājā bhadanta kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
XXavsata_u:5459: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:5460: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sāmātyapaurajānapadasya pratiśrutya śrāvastīto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo rājagṛhaṃ nagaram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5461: tataḥ pūrvaṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaram avalokya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5462: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5463: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sa puruṣo bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:5464: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ pṛcchanti,
XXavsata_u:5465: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:5469: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:5470: bhagavān āha: sacen me bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bimbisāro 'nujñāsyati; gamiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:5471: tataḥ sa dūto rājānaṃ bimbisāram anujñāpya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:5475: atha bhagavāṃs trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ mahatā parivāreṇa śrāvastyabhimukho 'bhijagāma /
XXavsata_u:5477: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃprasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:5478: tato rathād avatīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:5484: dūtaḥ prāha: yady api bhagavān ṛddhipādayānayāyī; tathāpi tu kriyatāṃ mamānugrahārtham anukampeti /
XXavsata_u:5485: atha bhagavān dūtasyānugrahārtham ṛddhyā rathasyopari sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5488: atha rājā sāmātyaḥ sapaurajānapado bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5489: tatraiva ca jetavane rātriṃvāsam upagato dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5490: sa ca dūto 'lpāyuṣko dharmaṃ śrutvā tasyām eva rātrau kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5491: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5492: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5494: sa paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5497: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:5498: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:5499_0: atha dūtapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ
XXavsata_u:5499_1: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām
XXavsata_u:5499_2: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ
XXavsata_u:5499_3: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:5500: atha bhagavān dūtapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:5501: yāṃ śrutvā dūtapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5503: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5515: AVŚ_57.3 mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ / (Speyer: suviśuddha cakṣuḥ)
XXavsata_u:5527: atha dūtapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5528: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5529: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
XXavsata_u:5530: tato rājā prasenajid upariprāsādatalagatas tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ papracha:
XXavsata_u:5531: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
XXavsata_u:5533: na mahārāja brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:5534: api tu tāvako dūtaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5539: aho buddho aho dharmaḥ aho saṃgho yatra nāma parīttaṃ karma kṛtvā mahān vipāka iti /
XXavsata_u:5540: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5541: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: tisra imā bhikṣavo 'graprajñaptayaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5542: katamās tisraḥ? buddhe agraprajñaptir dharme saṃghe 'graprajñaptiḥ /
XXavsata_u:5544: ye kecid satvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo va saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5547: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
XXavsata_u:5550: ye kecid dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmas teṣām agra ākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5552: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
XXavsata_u:5555: ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā pariṣado vā, tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghas teṣām agra ākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5557: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /

XXavsata_u:5564: saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann anyatamavanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5565: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe mahān mahiṣīyūthaḥ prativasati, pañcamātrāṇi ca mahiṣīpālaśatāni /
XXavsata_u:5566: yāvat tatrānyatamo mahiṣo balavān parameṇa balena samanvāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:5569: tato mahiṣīpālair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5570: tatas tair uccaiḥ śabdair uktaḥ: bhagavan, imaṃ mārgaṃ varjaya, duṣṭamahiṣo 'tra prativasatīti /
XXavsata_u:5573: athāsau duṣṭamahiṣo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā lāṅgūlam unnāmya yena bhagavāṃs tena pradhāvitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5574: tato bhagavatā purastāt pañca kesariṇaḥ saṭādhāriṇaḥ (Speyer: keśariṇaḥ saṭadhāriṇaḥ)
XXavsata_u:5575: siṃhā nirmitāḥ, vāme dakṣiṇe ca pārśve dvāv agniskandhau, upariṣṭān mahatyayomayī śilā /
XXavsata_u:5576: tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ samantato mahābhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ pādau niśritya dīnavadanaś ca bhagavantaṃ prekṣyate (Speyer: prekṣate) /
XXavsata_u:5577: tato 'sya bhagavatā tanmayyā gatyās tanmayyā yonyās tribhiḥ pādair dharmo deśitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5583: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:5584: AVŚ_58.1 idānīṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tiryagyonigatasya te /
XXavsata_u:5586: AVŚ_58.2 sādhu prasādyatāṃ cittaṃ mayi kāruṇike jine /
XXavsata_u:5590: sa āśu kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ //

XXavsata_u:5600: yāṃ śrutvā mahiṣapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5601: sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na
XXavsata_u:5603: devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5615: AVŚ_58.4 mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ / (Speyer: suviśuddha cakṣuḥ)
XXavsata_u:5626: atha tair mahiṣīpālaiḥ sa udāro 'vabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5627: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā kutūhalajātā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: ka eṣa bhagavan*,
XXavsata_u:5628: rātrau divyam avabhāsaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatsakāśam anuprāpta iti /
XXavsata_u:5630: sa eṣa bhavanto mahiṣo mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5634: tatas te mahiṣīpālāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ:
XXavsata_u:5635: āścaryaṃ yan nāma ayaṃ tiryagyonigato bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āsādya deveṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5637: kathaṃ nāma vayaṃ manuṣyabhūtā viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchemeti?
XXavsata_u:5638: tatas te buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5639: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
XXavsata_u:5640: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:5641: kāni bhadanta mahiṣapūrvikeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahiṣeṣūpapannaḥ?
XXavsata_u:5642: ebhiś ca mahiṣīpālaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāhartvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*?
XXavsata_u:5644: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:5647: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:5651: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:5652: AVŚ_58.7 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:5653: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:5654_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
XXavsata_u:5654_1: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
XXavsata_u:5658: tatra ca kāle bhikṣūṇāṃ viniścaye vartamāne tripiṭo bhikṣuḥ pañcaśataparivāro viniścaye 'avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5662: tena kupitena kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*: ime ca mahiṣā kiṃ prajānantīti /
XXavsata_u:5663: śiṣyair apy asyoktam: ime mahiṣīpālāḥ kiṃ prajānantīti //
XXavsata_u:5664: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mahiṣaḥ, ayam asau tripiṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5665: ye te śiṣyāḥ, ime te mahiṣīpālāḥ /
XXavsata_u:5668: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannaḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:5669: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye mahiṣasya mahiṣīpālāṇāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:5670: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:5672: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

XXavsata_u:5682: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:6451_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:6452: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:6454: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:6455: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:6456: yadāsau kumāro jātas tadā devatābhir divyāḥ patākāḥ samantata ucchrāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:6459: sarvaṃ ca kapilavastu nagaraṃ yaśasā āpūritam*,
XXavsata_u:6461: tasya jatau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:6462: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātasya yaśasā sarvaloka
XXavsata_u:6464: āpūritaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viditayaśā iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:6465: viditayaśā dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:6466: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:6468: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6470_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:6472: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:6473: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:6474: yāṃ śrutvā tena viditayaśasā dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6475: sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāni datvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6476_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:6477: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6478: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6481: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:6482: kāni bhadanta viditayaśasā karmāṇi kṛtāny yena jātamātrasya devatābhiḥ patākā ucchrāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:6486: viditayaśasaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:6489: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:6493: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:6494: AVŚ_70.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:6495: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:6496_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
XXavsata_u:6496_1: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
XXavsata_u:6500: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6501: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:6502: yatra anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:6504: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne mallānāṃ madhye patākā ucchrāpitā /
XXavsata_u:6507: sa tām ādāya anekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivṛto nānāvicitrair vādyair vādyamānair yena vipaśyinaḥ stūpas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6508: upasaṃkramya tathāgataguṇānām anusmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tāṃ patākāṃ stūpayaṣṭyāṃ baddhvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*:
XXavsata_u:6509: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:6510: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:6511: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena malla āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:6513: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:6515: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6518: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:6521: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:6525: suprabhā supriyā caiva śuklā somā tathāparā /
XXavsata_u:6526: kuvalayā sundarī yaiva muktā caiva kacaṅgalā /

XXavsata_u:6535: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:6536: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā divyālaṃkārabhūṣitā maṇiratnena kaṇṭhe ābaddhena /
XXavsata_u:6537: tasmāc ca prabhā nirgacchati, yayā sarvā śrāvastī avabhāsate /

XXavsata_u:6539: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād anayā jātamātrayā maṇiratnāvabhāsena sarvā śrāvastī avabhāsitā,
XXavsata_u:6541: sā suprabhā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:6542: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:6544: sā dārikā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā /
XXavsata_u:6545: tasyā ye ye yācanakā āgacchanti, tebhyas tebhyaḥ kaṇṭhād alaṃkāram avamucya prayacchati /
XXavsata_u:6547: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:6550: tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:6552: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca: tāta kim asi cintāpara iti /
XXavsata_u:6554: dārikā kathayati: tāta na te śokaḥ kartavyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6555: svayam evāhaṃ saptame divase svayaṃvaram avatariṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:6556: tataḥ śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:6557: saptame divase suprabhā dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:6558: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti //
XXavsata_u:6560: tataḥ saptame divase suprabhā dārikā rathābhirūḍhā kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrapaṭe lekhayitvā abhiṣṭuvatī vīthīm avatīrṇā /
XXavsata_u:6561: sā tatra rājaputrair amātyaputraiḥ śreṣṭhiputraiś ca sotkaṇṭhK‍h̲dvīkṣyamāṇā vicitrābhiḥ kathābhiḥ saṃjñapyovāca:
XXavsata_u:6562: sarvathāhaṃ na kenacid aṃśena bhavatāṃ paribhavaṃ karomi /
XXavsata_u:6567: suprabhāpi dārikā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:6568: tasyā bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:6569: yāṃ śrutvā suprabhayā dārikayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:6571: atha suprabhā dārikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:6572: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:6574: tato bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: anayā asmāc chāsane (Speyer: asmacchāsane)
XXavsata_u:6576: tato bhagavatoktā: gaccha dārike parṣadam avalokayeti /
XXavsata_u:6577: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā jetavanān nirgatya tatrāgatā /
XXavsata_u:6580: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā tair upakramyamāṇā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:6582: tatas te tad atyadbhūtaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddaṇḍaromāṇo mūlanikṛtta iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:6585: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān paribhuñjīthā iti /
XXavsata_u:6587: avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
XXavsata_u:6588: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:6645: āthāsyā mātāpitarāv anye ca gṛhavāsinas taṃ vākyavyāhāraṃ śrutvā bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā ākṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ (Speyer: āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ)
XXavsata_u:6647: sā kathayati: amba nāhaṃ piśācī nāpi rākṣasī, kiṃ tarhi dārikā /
XXavsata_u:6649: tato 'syā mātrā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveditam*: evam eṣā dārikā brūta iti /
XXavsata_u:6650: tatas tena gṛhapatinā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena bhagavān antargṛhe sabhikṣusaṃgho bhojitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6652: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa saptavarṣā saṃvṛttā, mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:6653: sā sarvāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā /
XXavsata_u:6654: yāvat tatra kālena mahādurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam*,
XXavsata_u:6656: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma: gaccha ānanda,
XXavsata_u:6658: catasras te parṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:6661: catasras te pariṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:6662: tataḥ supriyā kṛtakarapuṭā bhagavata ājñāṃ śirasi kṛtvā kathayati: evam astv iti //
XXavsata_u:6665: sa tvaritaṃ supriyāyā agrato bhūtaḥ kathayati: supriye kva gacchasīti /
XXavsata_u:6666: sā kathayati: bhagavān āha traimāsyaṃ vaiyāvṛtyakarmaṇi niyukteti /

XXavsata_u:6872_0: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā
XXavsata_u:6878: bhagavān āha: na hi bhikṣuṇyas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ padaśo dharmam uddiśanti /
XXavsata_u:6879: yadi yuṣmākaṃ kācid utsahate (Speyer: ucchahate) sakṛduktaṃ dhārayitum*, evam aham uddiśeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:6880: tena khalu samayena sā bhikṣuṇī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā /
XXavsata_u:6881: atha sā bhikṣuṇī utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocat*:
XXavsata_u:6886: tato bhagavatā vistareṇoddiṣṭaḥ, somayā sakṛdukto dhāritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6888: eṣā agrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharīṇāṃ yaduta somā bhikṣuṇī //
XXavsata_u:6889: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:6890: kāni bhadanta somayā bikṣuṇyā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:6891: yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śrutidharā ca saṃvṛtteti /
XXavsata_u:6893: somayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:6896: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:6900: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:6901: AVŚ_74.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:6902: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:6903_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:6903_1: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
XXavsata_u:6903_2: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:6904: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:6905: yāvad anyatarā brāhmaṇadārikā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:6906: tayā tatroddiṣṭaṃ paṭhitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6907: na tu śaktitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
XXavsata_u:6908: yasyāś copādhyāyikāyāḥ sakāśe pravrajitāsīt*, sā bhagavatā kāśyapena śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:6909: tataḥ somayā bhikṣuṇyā maraṇakāle praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:6910: yathā me upādhyāyikā śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā,
XXavsata_u:6911: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:6912: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:6913: tasya śāsane pravrajitā bhagavatā śākyamuninā śrutidharīṇām agrā nirdiśyeya //
XXavsata_u:6914: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau brāhmaṇadārikā āsīt*, iyaṃ sā somā bhikṣuṇī /
XXavsata_u:6915: yad anayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*, tena śrutidharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:6916: yad anayā tasyoddiṣṭaṃ paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitam*, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:6917: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6920: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:6923: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:6927_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:6927_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:6928: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare girivalgusamāgamo nāma parva pratyupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:6929: tatra sarvebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyo mahānagarebhyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatati /
XXavsata_u:6931: tasya duhitā kuvalayā nāma abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
XXavsata_u:6933: yadā raṅgamadhyam avatarati, tadā sarvaprekṣakaiḥ sotkaṇṭhair udvīkṣyate /
XXavsata_u:6935: tatra yadā parva pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati, tadā pūraṇaprabhṛtayaḥ saparṣatkā upasaṃkrāmanti /
XXavsata_u:6937: asti bhavanto rājagṛhe nagare kaścin manuṣyabhūto yo me rūpeṇa samo viśiṣṭataro veti /
XXavsata_u:6938: janakāyenoktā: asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ saparivāra iti /
XXavsata_u:6939: kuvalayovāca: kim asau manuṣyabhūto 'tha deva iti /
XXavsata_u:6941: tatas tadvacanam upaśrutya kuvalayā sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:6942: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā nṛtyati gāyati vādayate strīliṅgāni strīcihnāni strīnimittāni copadarśayati /
XXavsata_u:6943: ye sarāgā bhikṣavas te tayā saṃbhrāmitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:6944: tato bhagavān rāgabahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vinayanārthaṃ kuvalayāyāś ca rūpayauvanamadāpanayanārthaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃkārān abhisaṃkṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:6945: yena kuvalayā jīrṇā vṛddhā palitaśiraskā khaṇḍadantā kubjagopānasīvaktrā nirmitā /
XXavsata_u:6946: tatkālasamanantaram eva kuvalāyā ātmānaṃ bībhatsam abhivīkṣya yo 'sau rūpayauvanamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:6948: tataḥ kuvalayā apagatamadā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavatī:
XXavsata_u:6949: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu,
XXavsata_u:6952: atha bhagavān kuvalāyās teṣāṃ cāvītarāgāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tāthavidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:6953: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścid viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:6958_0: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:6959: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā
XXavsata_u:6962: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:6963: tair api naṭais tena saṃvegena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
XXavsata_u:6964: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:6965: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā kuvalayā naṭadārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā saṃvejya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā iti /
XXavsata_u:6967_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
XXavsata_u:6967_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena kuvalayā dārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā
XXavsata_u:6968_0: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
XXavsata_u:6968_1: kuvalayā dārikā saṃvejya pañcasu vratapradeśeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitā /
XXavsata_u:6969: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
XXavsata_u:6970_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
XXavsata_u:6970_1: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:6972: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:6973: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:6974: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:6975: dāriko jāto abhirūpo darśanīyo prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaṇaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6976: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:6977: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya pitā kāśirājaḥ,
XXavsata_u:6979: tasmād bhavatu dārikasya kāśisundara iti nāma /
XXavsata_u:6980: kāśisundaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:6981: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:6984: so 'nekadoṣaduṣṭam anarthamūlaṃ rājatvaṃ viditvā ṛiṣiṣu pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6985: sa ca himavatkandare prativasati phalamūlāṃbubhakto 'jinavalkaladhārī agnihotrikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6986: yāvad apareṇa samayena phalānām artham anyataraṃ parvatakandaram anupravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:6988: ṛiṣikumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃraktā nṛtyati gāyati vādayati strīcihnāni strīnimittāni strīvikrīḍitāny upadarśayati /
XXavsata_u:6989: yāvat kāśisundareṇa ṛṣiṇā tasyā dārikāyā dharmadeśanā dattā /
XXavsata_u:6990: jīrṇāsi bhagini, prathamas te svaro madhuraḥ snigdhaś ca, paścimas te jarjarībhūta iti /
XXavsata_u:6991: tatas tena tasyā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā kinnarakanyāyā yo 'bhūd rūpamadaḥ
XXavsata_u:6994: tayā prasādajātayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yasmin samaye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyethāḥ,
XXavsata_u:6996: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena ṛṣikumāro babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /
XXavsata_u:6998: bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti: kāni bhadanta kuvalayayā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:7000: kāni karmaṇi kṛtāni yenārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam api /
XXavsata_u:7002: kuvalayayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:7005: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:7009: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:7010: AVŚ_75.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:7011: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:7012_1: nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
XXavsata_u:7016: rājñā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyadarśanaṃ kṛtvā naṭācāryāṇām ājñā dattā:
XXavsata_u:7017: bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ mama purastān nāṭayitavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:7018: tair ājñā śirasi pratigṛhītā: evaṃ bhadanteti /
XXavsata_u:7019: tataḥ sarvanaṭair bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ vicārya muninirjitaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:7020: yāvad rājño 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtasya purato naṭā nāṭayitum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7021: tatra naṭācāryaḥ svayam eva buddhaveṣeṇāvatīrṇaḥ, pariśiṣṭā naṭā bhikṣuveṣeṇa /
XXavsata_u:7022: tato rājñā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena naṭācāryapramukho naṭagaṇo mahatā dhanaskandhenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7023: tatas te bhagavacchāsane labdhaprasādā dānapradānāni datvā samyakpraṇidhānaṃ cakruḥ:
XXavsata_u:7024: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān buddhān ārāgayema, mā virāgayemeti //
XXavsata_u:7025: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo ye te naṭāḥ, ime te kuvalayāpramukhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7026: yad ebhis tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:7027: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:7030: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:7033: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:7037_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:7037_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:7038_0: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā brahmadatto rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ
XXavsata_u:7038_1: ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ
XXavsata_u:7040: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:7041: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7042: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:7043: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
XXavsata_u:7044: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:7045: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād iyaṃ kāśirājasya duhitā surūpā ca,
XXavsata_u:7047: kāśisundarī dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:7048: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:7050: yadā kāśisundarī dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:7051: tadā prātisīmaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ rājabhī rājñe brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:7052: śrutam asmābhir yathā tava duhitā jāteti /
XXavsata_u:7053: tad arhasy asmākaṃ putrāṇām anyatarasmai anupradātum iti /
XXavsata_u:7054: tato rājā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
XXavsata_u:7058: kāśisundarī dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:7059: tayā pitā śokārto dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca: tāta kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyata iti /
XXavsata_u:7061: tataḥ kāśisundarī pitaram uvāca: kriyatāṃ tāta prātisīmānāṃ rājñāṃ dūtasaṃpreṣaṇam* /
XXavsata_u:7062: saptame divase kāśisundarī dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:7063: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti /
XXavsata_u:7064: yāvat saptame divase ṣaṭ prātisīmā rājānaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7065: kāśisundary api ratham abhiruhya kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhapaṭaṃ hastena gṛhītvā rājasabhāṃ gatvovāca:
XXavsata_u:7067: nāhaṃ bhavatāṃ rūpayauvanakulabhogaiśvaryaṃ tulayāmi, api tu nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī /
XXavsata_u:7068: ya eṣa eva me bhagavān buddhaḥ paṭe likhitas tasyāhaṃ śrāvikā /

XXavsata_u:7078: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:7079: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7080: tatas te rājaputrās tasyā rūpayauvanaśobhāṃ samanusmṛtya rāgamadamattāḥ pravrajitām api prārthayituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7081: sā taiḥ prārthyamānā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam (Speyer: gagaṇatalam)
XXavsata_u:7084: tatas te rāputrā atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitum ārabdhāḥ: marṣaya bhagini /
XXavsata_u:7085: yathaite tvayā dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ, asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti /
XXavsata_u:7086: tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,

XXavsata_u:7109: yad anayā vihāraḥ pratipāditas tenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7110: yat kanakamunau bhagavati pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhāvitā tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:7122: śrāvastyāṃ puṣyo nāma śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:7124: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:7125: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7126: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:7127: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā muktāmālayā śirasi baddhayā /
XXavsata_u:7128: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:7129: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asyā jātamātrāyā muktamālā śirasi prādurbhūtaṃ,
XXavsata_u:7131: muktā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:7132: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:7134: yāvan muktā dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7135: tasyāḥ sā muktāmālā avatāritā punaḥ prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:7136: tataḥ sā dārikā kṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:7138: tadā tasyā bahavo yācanakā āgacchanti rājaputrā amātyaputrāḥ śreṣṭhiputrāś ca /
XXavsata_u:7139: tato 'syāḥ pitā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
XXavsata_u:7142: tato 'sau dārikā pitaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: tāta kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyata iti /
XXavsata_u:7144: tato dārikā kathayati: tāta nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī /
XXavsata_u:7146: yāvad anāthapiṇḍadasya supriyo nāma kanīyaḥ putras tena pitā vijñaptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7148: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena puṣyasya gṛhapater dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*: dīyatāṃ muktā dārikā mama putrāya /
XXavsata_u:7149: evaṃ kṛtaṃ sāṃbandhikaṃ yāvajjīvasukhyaṃ kṛtaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:7150: tataḥ puṣyeṇa gṛhapatinā svasyāṃ duhitari so 'rtho niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7151: sā kathayati: samayato yadīndriyāṇāṃ paripākān mayā saha bhagavacchāsane pravrajati,
XXavsata_u:7154: yāvad ubhāv eva gṛhān niṣkramya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitau /

XXavsata_u:7178: tasya ca bhāryā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā /

XXavsata_u:7182: yanv ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane pañcavārṣikaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:7184: icchāmy ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ samādāpya bhagavataḥ pañcavārṣikaṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:7186: athāsau gṛhapatir hastiskandhārūḍho vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryāṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7187: yāvat sārthavāhabhāryā muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'vamucya tasmiṃś chandakabhikṣaṇe dattavatī /
XXavsata_u:7188: yāvat sārthavāha āgatas taṃ muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'panītaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*:

XXavsata_u:7383: tatas tayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yathaiṣā upādhyāyikā prajñāvatīnām agrā nirdiṣṭā,
XXavsata_u:7384: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:7385: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:7386: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajitvā prajñāvatīnām agrā bhaveyam iti //
XXavsata_u:7387: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhiduhitā,

XXavsata_u:7390: yat tayā dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitaḥ, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:7754: hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:7755: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:7757: sa śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
XXavsata_u:7760: ya yadā vīthīm avatīrṇo bhavati, tadā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā pāṇidvayaṃ prasārayati /
XXavsata_u:7761: tato lakṣaṇāhatasya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rāśiḥ prādurbhavati, yena tān saṃtarpayati /
XXavsata_u:7763: yāvad hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'pareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:7764_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:7766: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:7769: icchāmy aham ācārya bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya bhaktaṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:7771: tato hiraṇyapāṇinā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya purastāt sthitvā pāṇidvayaṃ prasārya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya mahān rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:7772: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃghasthaviro 'nye ca bhikṣavaḥ sthavirānandaś ca paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7773: tato hiraṇyapāṇir dārako buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:7774: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:7775: yāṃ śrutvā hiraṇyapāṇidārikeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:7776: dṛṣṭasatyo jñātīnāṃ bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇkṛpaṇanīpakān saṃtarpya mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7777_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:7778: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7779: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:7780: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:7785: hiraṇyapāṇinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:7788: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:7792: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:7793: AVŚ_83.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:7794: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:7795_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:7795_1: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
XXavsata_u:7798: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:7799: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7800: tasya rājñā kṛkiṇā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:7801: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne dyūtakareṇa dīnāradvayaṃ tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ samāropitam* /
XXavsata_u:7802: tataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*: yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:7804: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena dyūtakara āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:7806: yad anena stūpe dīnāradvayaṃ samāropitam*, tenāsyaivaṃvidho viśeṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7807: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:7808: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:7811: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:7814: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:7817_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:7817_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:7818_0: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca
XXavsata_u:7818_1: sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca {subhikṣaṃ ca} ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:7820: yāvad asau devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:7821: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:7822: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:7823: dārako jātaḥ kāṣāyavastraṃ prāvṛtya śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:7825: kiṃ bhagavān ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandaprabhṛtayo vā mahāśrāvakā iti /
XXavsata_u:7826: tato 'sya mātā vismayaharṣapūrṇā kathayati: putraka bhagavān ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ mahāśrāvakāś ceti /
XXavsata_u:7827: yāvad eṣo 'rtho rājñaḥ prasenajito niveditaḥ: putras te jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7829: sa bhagavato mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ ca pravṛttim anveṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:7830: tato rājñā prasenajitā tasyānugrahāryaṃ bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7831: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajito bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7832: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7833: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ putram utsaṅge kṛtvā bhagavato darśayati:
XXavsata_u:7834: ayaṃ me bhagavan putro jātamātra eṣa
XXavsata_u:7837: tato bhagavāṃs taṃ kumāram āmantrayate: ārogyaṃ te tripiṭeti /
XXavsata_u:7838: sa kathayati: vande tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham iti /
XXavsata_u:7839: tato rājā prasenajit param vismayam āpannaḥ //
XXavsata_u:7840: yadā saptavarṣo jātas tadā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitas tair eva kāṣāyaiḥ prāvṛtaḥ /

XXavsata_u:7866: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā rājānaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: anujānīhi māṃ tāta,
XXavsata_u:7868: rājovāca: na śakyam etan mayā kartum* /
XXavsata_u:7870: kumāraḥ kathayati: alaṃ me rājyena bahudoṣaduṣṭadharmasaṃpannena /
XXavsata_u:7873: tenaiko bhaktacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ, dvau trayo vā yāvat ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7879: karitaḥ: tāvat te 'smākaṃ darśanaṃ na deyam*, yāvat trayaḥ piṭakā adhītā iti /
XXavsata_u:7880: yāvad asau pitaram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7881: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena nacireṇa trayaḥ piṭakā adhītāḥ /
XXavsata_u:7883: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:7885: sa pṛṣṭaś ca: kiṃ putra asti kiṃcid adhītam iti? tenoktam*: trayaḥ piṭakā iti /
XXavsata_u:7886: tatas tena pitus tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā rājā āttamanāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7887: tataḥ prasādajātaḥ kathayati: putra kena te prayojanam iti /
XXavsata_u:7889: icchāmy ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upanimantrya ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchādayitum iti /
XXavsata_u:7890: rājā kathayati: yatheṣṭaṃ kuruṣva, vistīrṇaṃ rājakulam iti /
XXavsata_u:7891: tatas tripiṭena bhagavān viṃśatisahasraparivāraḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7892: ekaikaś ca bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7893: tataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yan mayā idānīṃ kṛcchreṇa pravrajyā pratilabdhā,
XXavsata_u:7895: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya tatra tatra kāṣāyavastraprāvṛta eva śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca syām iti //

XXavsata_u:7919: yatra ca divase dārako jātas tatraiva divase 'nāvṛṣṭir bhagnā /

XXavsata_u:8185: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /

XXavsata_u:8188: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā / sā
XXavsata_u:8190: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:8191: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:8192: tasya janmany anekāny adbhutāni prādurbhūtāni, yaiḥ kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam* /
XXavsata_u:8193: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:8194: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam*,
XXavsata_u:8195: tasmād asya bhavatu śobhita iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:8196: śobhito dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:8197: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:8199: sa yadā mahān samvṛttas tadā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gato bhagavato darśanāya /
XXavsata_u:8200_0: dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair
XXavsata_u:8200_1: virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ
XXavsata_u:8202: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:8203: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:8204: yāṃ śrutvā śobhitena dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:8211: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam*,
XXavsata_u:8215: śobhitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:8218: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,

XXavsata_u:8223: AVŚ_87.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /

XXavsata_u:8226_1: prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
XXavsata_u:8226_2: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /

XXavsata_u:8231: tatraiko goṣṭhikaḥ kathayati: ahaṃ na karomi, mama vibhavo nāstīti /
XXavsata_u:8234: tena vicitrapuṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā tasminn eva stūpe puṣpāropaṇaṃ kṛtam* //
XXavsata_u:8235: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena goṣṭhika āsīt,
XXavsata_u:8236: yena vipratisārajātena krakucchandasya keśanakhastūpe puṣpāripaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:8238: anyāny api hi bhikṣavaḥ śobhitena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:8239: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī /
XXavsata_u:8241: tataḥ prasādajātena pādayor nipatya piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:8242: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī, ayaṃ śobhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8247: tatas tena prasādajātena tṛṇāny utpāṭya saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā stūpāṅgaṇaṃ ca saṃmṛṣṭam* /
XXavsata_u:8248: tataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:8249: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deydharmaparityāgena ca abhirūpaḥ syāṃ darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8250: anāgatāṃś ca buddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //

XXavsata_u:8268_1: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:8270: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:8271: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8272: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kapphiṇa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
XXavsata_u:8273: kapphiṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:8274: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:8276: yasminn eva divase kapphiṇaḥ kumāro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8277: tasminn eva divase aṣṭādaśānām amātyasahasrāṇāṃ putrā jātāḥ, sarve mahānagnāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8279: yad rājā kalpaḥ kāladharmeṇa saṃyuktaḥ, tasyātyayāt kapphiṇaḥ kumāro rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8281: athāpareṇa samayena rājā mahākapphiṇo 'ṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8282: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:8283: asti bhavantaḥ kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughaḥ tadyathā mamaivaitarhīti?
XXavsata_u:8284: tataḥ priyavādibhir amātyair abhihitam*: deva nānyasya kasyacid iti /
XXavsata_u:8287: rājñā uktāḥ: bho vaṇijaḥ, kas tatra rājeti /
XXavsata_u:8288: vaṇijaḥ kathayanti: deva kecid deśā gaṇādhīnāḥ kecid rājādhīnā iti /
XXavsata_u:8289: yāvad rājñā mahākapphiṇena śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:8293: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya ekasamūhena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8295: taiḥ sa vṛttānto bhagavato vistareṇa niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8296: bhagavatā te samāśvāsitāḥ, uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti /
XXavsata_u:8298: asty asmākaṃ rājādhirāja, taṃ tāvat paśyeti //
XXavsata_u:8299: tato bhagavatā dūtāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayam nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:8305: svayaṃ ca bhagavatā cakravartiveṣo nirmitaḥ, saptatālodgataṃ ca simḥāsanaṃ yatra bhagavān niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8306: tato dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8307: tato bhagavatā lekhaṃ lekhayitvā sa dūto 'bhihitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:8313: athavā nāgacchasi, aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:8314: tato dūtena gatvā rājño mahākapphiṇasya lekhaṃ vācikaṃ ca yat saṃdiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ niveditam* //
XXavsata_u:8315: tataḥ kapphiṇo rājā aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivṛto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8316: prātisīmāś ca rājāno rājānaṃ mahākapphiṇaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8319: tato bhagavatā tasyāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:8321: airāvatasadṛśā hastinaḥ, bālāhakasadṛśā aśvāḥ, nandīghoṣasadṛśā rathāḥ, vyāḍayakṣasadṛśā manuṣyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8323: saptatālodgataṃ ca siṃhāsanaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva nirmitam* /
XXavsata_u:8325: sahadarśanād asya yo rūpo rūpamadaḥ, aiśvarye aiśvaryamadaḥ, sa prativigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8328: aho bata śakro devendra aindraṃ dhanur ādāya āgacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:8329: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ sārathiveṣeṇa aindraṃ dhanur upanāmayati /
XXavsata_u:8331: tac ca rājā mahākapphiṇa utkraṣṭum api na śaknoti, kutaḥ punar āropayiṣyati /
XXavsata_u:8333: svayaṃ ca tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ, yena tāḥ saptāyobheryaś chidrīkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8336: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:8337: AVŚ_88.2 yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /

XXavsata_u:8340: tato rājñaḥ kapphiṇasya yo 'bhūd balamadaḥ, sa prativigataḥ /

XXavsata_u:8345: parṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati,

XXavsata_u:8386: maṇḍayeyam idaṃ pravacanaṃ yaduta śāstā ca saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /

XXavsata_u:8399: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:8400: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:8405: kapphiṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:8409: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:8413: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:8414: AVŚ_88.3 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:8415: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:8416_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
XXavsata_u:8416_1: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:8417: sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati bandhumatīyake dāve /
XXavsata_u:8418: yāvad anyatamena sārthavāhena mahāsamudrāt prabhūtāni ratnāny ānītāni /
XXavsata_u:8420: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitavān* //
XXavsata_u:8421: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa evāsau kapphiṇo rājā tena kālena tena samayena /
XXavsata_u:8422: yad anena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyaṃ svāntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8423: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaḥ ### {tenedānīm abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ} ### aparāṇy api bhikṣavaḥ kapphiṇena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:8424_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā
XXavsata_u:8424_1: rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
XXavsata_u:8431: parinirvṛtasya ca śarīrastūpaṃ kārayitvā amātyagaṇasahāyena tailābhiṣeko dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8436: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8439: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:8442: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:8446_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:8446_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:8447: yadā bhagavān ṣaḍvarṣābhisaṃbuddho dvādaśavarṣanirgataḥ kapilavastu anuprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8448: tadā droṇodanāmṛtodanapramukhair anekaiḥ śākyasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ sthāpayitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanam* /
XXavsata_u:8449: tato rājā śuddhodanas tāṃ putraśobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8450: tasya buddhir utpannā: yadi me putro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat*,
XXavsata_u:8451: so 'yam abhaviṣyad rājā cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8453: yanv ahaṃ śākyakulebhya ekaikaṃ pravrājayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:8454: tato rājñā śuddhodanena nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*: sarvaśākyaiḥ saṃnipattavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:8455: tataḥ sarvaśākyeṣu saṃnipatiteṣu rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śākyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8458: tad idānīm asya pravrajitasya ekaikena kulapuruṣeṇa śākyenopasthāyakena pravrajitavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:8460: teṣām upālir nāma kalpaka upasthāyakaḥ tān pravrajitān dṛṣṭvā roditum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8461: tataḥ śākyaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: kimartham upāle rudyata iti /
XXavsata_u:8462: sa karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair uvāca: yūyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8464: tataḥ śākyā ūcuḥ: tena hi upāle, paṭakaṃ prasārayeti /
XXavsata_u:8466: tataḥ śākyaiḥ śarīrāvalagnānāṃ hārārdhahāramaṇimukhtāvaiḍūryakeyūrāṅgulīyakānāṃ mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8467: tata upāleḥ kalpakasya tān dṛṣṭvā vicitraṃ cālaṃkāram abhivīkṣya yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
XXavsata_u:8468: ime tāvac chākyāḥ kularūpayuvanavanto 'ntaḥpurāṇi imaṃ cālaṃkāraṃ kheṭavad utsṛjya pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8469: kim utāham alpavibhavaḥ imam alaṃkāraṃ gṛhaṃ neṣyāmi? alam anena /
XXavsata_u:8472: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:8474: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*,
XXavsata_u:8477: tato bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni bhikṣunepathyadhārīṇi (Speyer: bhikṣuveṣadhārīṇi)
XXavsata_u:8479: te upāliṃ jñātvā kularūpavibhavānvitatvān necchanty upāleḥ
XXavsata_u:8482: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ bhadrikam āmantrayate: bhadrika kartavyo 'sya praṇāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8483: yasmād idaṃ māmakaṃ śāsanaṃ na kularūpayauvanaiśvaryacāturvarṇyaviśuddhim apekṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:8484: tato mūlanikṛttā iva drumā bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni dharmatām avalambya pādayor nipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:8485: teṣām pādavandanasamakālam eveyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā /
XXavsata_u:8486_0: tatrāyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ
XXavsata_u:8487: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8488: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8490: so 'pareṇa samayena pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ gocarāya prasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8492: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśala ekapuṇḍarīkaṃ hastināgam abhiruhya dīrgheṇa cārāyaṇena sārathinā bhagavato darśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8493: dadarśa rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadrikaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasam*,
XXavsata_u:8494: parameṇa ca cittadamavyupaśamanasamanvāgataṃ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛtaṃ lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tasmāc caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgacchantam* /
XXavsata_u:8495: dṛṣṭvā ca punar dīrghaṃ cārāyaṇaṃ sārathim āmantrayate: syād ayaṃ cārāyaṇa bhadriko bhikṣuḥ?
XXavsata_u:8497: iti śrutvā rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ saṃmoham āpannaḥ, pṛthivyāṃ mūrcchitaḥ patitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8499: tato rājā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam uvāca: bhagavan,
XXavsata_u:8501: asau bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛto lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā devamanuṣyāvarjanakareṇātipraśānteneryāpathena piṇḍapātam ādāya caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8502: tasya mamaitad abhavat*: āścarya yāvat suvinītaṃ bhagavacchāsanam*,
XXavsata_u:8503: yatra nāma evaṃvidhāḥ kumārāḥ sukhaidhitā evaṃvinītapracārāḥ saṃvṛttā iti /
XXavsata_u:8504: bhagavān āha: aparam api mahārāja bhadrikasyāścaryaṃ śṛṇu /
XXavsata_u:8505: ayaṃ mahārāja bhadriko 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā trir udānayati:
XXavsata_u:8507: yad aham apravrajitaḥ san rājakulamadhyagato 'mātyanaigamajānapadasusaṃrakṣitaḥ prākāraparikhādvārastūpābhinigūḍhaḥ pariśaṅkitahṛdayaḥ saṃvignaḥ samantataḥśaṅkī nidrāṃ nāsādayāmi /
XXavsata_u:8508: so 'ham etarhi nirapekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca sukhaṃ yatratatrastho viharāmīti //
XXavsata_u:8509: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:8510: kāni bhadanta bhadrikeṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:8511: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika āḍhye rājakule pratyājātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8514: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:8518: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:8522: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:8523: AVŚ_89.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:8524: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:8525: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ kṣutkṣāmaparigataśarīraḥ itaś cāmutaś cānvāhiṇḍate /
XXavsata_u:8526: yāvad anyatarā dārikā pūpalikā ādāya gacchati /
XXavsata_u:8527: tatas tena koṭṭamallakena sā dārikā pūpalikānām arthe abhibhūtā /
XXavsata_u:8528: tato balād ekām pūpalikām ādāya itas tataḥ (Speyer: ta[tas ta]taḥ) palāyitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8531: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:8532: tadā anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasya koṭṭamallakasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8533: tataḥ koṭṭamallasya taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ śānteryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8534: tena svaṃ vyasanam agaṇayya pratyekabuddhāya pūpalikā pratipāditā /
XXavsata_u:8535: tasya vipraharṣasaṃjananārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8536: tataḥ koṭṭamallakas tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛttā iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:8537: yan me siddhavrato dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūpalikayā pratipāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8538: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:8541: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:8542: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena koṭṭamallakaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8544: yat tena pratyekabuddhaḥ pūlikayā pratipāditaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye śākye pratyāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8548: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8551: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:8554: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:8558_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:8558_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:8559_0: tena khalu samayena sthūlakoṣṭhake kauravyo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
XXavsata_u:8559_1: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:8561: tasya bhrātṛputro rāṣṭrapālo nāmnā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8562: tasya vinayakālam avekṣya bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ sthūlakoṣṭhakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8563_0: dadarśa rāṣṭrapālo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:8565: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pravrajyāṃ yācate /
XXavsata_u:8566: tatas taṃ bhagavān āha: vatsa anujñāto 'si mātāpitṛbhyām iti? rāṣṭrapālaḥ kathayati: no bhadanteti /
XXavsata_u:8567: bhagavān āha: na hi vatsa tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā anujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti,
XXavsata_u:8570: upasaṃkramya buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate: dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavāñ chākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8571: sphītaṃ cakravartirājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ cāntaḥpurasahasrāṇi /
XXavsata_u:8572: muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭipravṛtto 'sminn eva sthūlakoṣṭhake piṇḍapātam aṭati /
XXavsata_u:8573: tad arhato yuvāṃ mām anujñātum*: yad ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:8576: dvau trayo vā yāvac chaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ //
XXavsata_u:8577: atha rāṣṭrapālasya mātāpitarau yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntau /
XXavsata_u:8587: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva, dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru /
XXavsata_u:8590: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau jñātīn udyojayataḥ:
XXavsata_u:8591: aṅga tāvaj jñātayaḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam utthāpayata /
XXavsata_u:8592: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya jñātayo yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8602: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva, dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru /
XXavsata_u:8604: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakān udyojayataḥ:
XXavsata_u:8607: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8617: ihaiva tvaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva, dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru /
XXavsata_u:8619: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8620: upasaṃkramya rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarāv idam avocan*: amba tāta,
XXavsata_u:8621: anujānītaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapālaṃ pravrajituṃ samyag eva śraddhayā agarād anagārikām*,
XXavsata_u:8623: sacet tātaḥ pravrajyāyām abhiraṃsyate, jīvantam enaṃ drakṣyadhve /
XXavsata_u:8624: sacen nābhiramate, kā anyā putrasya gatir anyatra mātāpitarāv eva /
XXavsata_u:8625: evam āvāṃ kumārakāḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam anujānīyāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8627: atha rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro 'nupūrveṇa kāyasya sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca saṃjanayya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8629: ekānte sthito rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:8631: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:8633: labdhavān rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:8634_0: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sann idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
XXavsata_u:8635: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo
XXavsata_u:8638: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8640: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ {āraṇyakānāṃ }yaduta rāṣṭrapālo bhiksur iti //
XXavsata_u:8641: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:8647: rāṣṭrapālenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:8650: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:8654: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:8656: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:8657: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani videharājaḥ saparivāraḥ paracakravitrāsito 'ṭavīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8658: sa madhyāhne tīkṣṇasūryaraśmiparitāpitaḥ sabalaugha itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramati,
XXavsata_u:8660: asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:8661: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasmin kāntāramārge prativasati /
XXavsata_u:8662: tena kāruṇyam utpādya tasya videharājasya mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8665: tato rājñā prasādajātena svanagaram ānīya traimāsyaṃ sarvopakaraṇair upasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8667: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtavān: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:8668: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ ca śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:8669: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:8671: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:8672_0: asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
XXavsata_u:8672_1: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
XXavsata_u:8673: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:8674_0: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ kṛkī rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
XXavsata_u:8674_1: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:8677_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:8677_2: jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* / sahadarśanāc
XXavsata_u:8680: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:8682: tena prasādajātena bhagavān kāśyapaḥ saparivāra upasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8684: parinirvṛtasya ca stūpe kanīyāñ chatram āropitavān* /
XXavsata_u:8685: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājaputraḥ, ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālas tena kālena tena samayena /
XXavsata_u:8686: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:8687: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamo mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8689: tena tatra paryaṭatā vanānte glānaḥ pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8692: tadā piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ {guṇānāṃ} labhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:8693: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:8694: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ, ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8695: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre na kadācid duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:8696: idānīm apy āḍhye rājakule pratyājāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8698: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8701: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:8704: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:8708: subhūtiḥ sthaviraś cāpi hasta lekuñcikas tathā /
XXavsata_u:8709: saṃsāro guptikaś cāpi virūpo gaṅgikena ca /
XXavsata_u:8710: dīrghanakhaḥ saṃgītiś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:8713_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:8713_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:8714: yadā bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya śrāvakā niyuktās teṣu janapadeṣu vineyajanānugrahārtham*,
XXavsata_u:8715: tadā ye 'dhyāyinas te sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāṃ dhyānaparā sthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8717: sa taṃ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyām āropya bhakṣayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8718: tato nāgapotalako jīvitād vyaparopyamāṇo mahāśrāvakāṇām antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ //
XXavsata_u:8719: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastyāṃ bhūtir nāma brāhmaṇaḥ, tasyāgramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8720: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:8722: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:8723: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya pitā bhūtiḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhūtir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:8724: subhūtir dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān samvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8725: sa pūrveṇa hetubalādhānena atīva roṣaṇaḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahulo mātāpitṛbhyām ātharvaṇād vinivartya ṛṣiṣu pravrājitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8726: sa ca tatra dhyānaparaḥ saṃyato 'nyatarad vanaṣaṇḍam upaniśritya viharati /
XXavsata_u:8727: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe devatā prativasati dṛṣṭasatyā /
XXavsata_u:8728: tasyāḥ kāruṇyam utpannam*: ayaṃ kulaputraḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahalo viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchati /
XXavsata_u:8729: yanv aham enaṃ bhagavaddarśane niyojayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:8730: tatas tayā devatayā subhūteḥ purastād buddhasya varṇo bhāṣito dharmasya ca saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:8732: tato devatayā ṛddhyanubhāvād (Speyer: ṛddhyānubhāvād) bhagavatsakāśam upanītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8733_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
XXavsata_u:8737: tataḥ prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:8738: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:8739: yāṃ śrutvā subhūtinā kulaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:8741: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena maitrībhāvanayā cittaṃ damayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:8742: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8743: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:8744: tatra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ: kuto 'haṃ cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti /
XXavsata_u:8745: paśyati: pañca jātiśatāni nāgebhyaś cyuto nāgeṣv evopapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8746: tasya buddhir utpannā: mayā atīva evaṃvidho dveṣapratyayopasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8749: idānīṃ punas tathā kariṣyāmi yat pareṣām antike dveṣopasaṃbhāro notpatsyate /
XXavsata_u:8750: yena samanvāgataḥ kāyasya bhedād apāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
XXavsata_u:8752: yadā saṃghe vā grāme vā deśe vā janapade vā bhikṣāhetor vihartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:8753: tadā pūrvataraṃ gocaram avalokayati: mā māṃ kaścit kāraṇena dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:8758: tata āyuṣmataḥ subhūter buddhir utpannā: yanv aham idānīṃ mahājanānugrahārthaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:8759: tatas tena ṛddhyā pañca suparṇiśatāni nirmitāni,
XXavsata_u:8760: yāni dṛṣṭvā nāgā bhītās trastā saṃvignā itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8763: punar api mahāntaṃ nāgarūpam abhinirmāya pañca garuḍaśatāny abhidrutāni /
XXavsata_u:8765: evaṃ tena nāgānāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca pañca kulaśatāni vinītāni /
XXavsata_u:8767: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇām araṇāvihāriṇāṃ yaduta subhūtiḥ kulaputraḥ //
XXavsata_u:8768: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:8769: kāni bhadanta subhūtinā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāraṇāvihāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti /
XXavsata_u:8771: subhūtinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:8774: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau,
XXavsata_u:8778: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:8779: AVŚ_91.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:8780: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:8781_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
XXavsata_u:8781_1: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
XXavsata_u:8781_2: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:8782: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:8787: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:8788: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:8789: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya araṇāvihāriṇām agraḥ syām iti //
XXavsata_u:8791: aprahīṇatvāt kleśānām udbhrāntatvād indriyāṇām aparyantīkṛtatvāt karmapathānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣabhikṣuṣu cittaṃ pradūṣya āśīviṣavādena samudācaritāḥ,
XXavsata_u:8797: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8800: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:8803: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:8806_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:8806_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:8807: anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:8809: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:8810: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā, na prasūyate /
XXavsata_u:8811: yāvad bhūyas tayaiva sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:8812: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8813: sa prathamagarbho yathāvasthitaḥ eva mātur udare /
XXavsata_u:8821: yadā cāsyā maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā nacireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyatīti,
XXavsata_u:8822: tadā tayā svāmī uktaḥ: yat khalv āryaputra jānīyāḥ mamātra prathamagarbho 'vatiṣṭhate /
XXavsata_u:8824: tadā dakṣiṇapārśvaṃ śastreṇa ghātayitvā tataḥ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddharethāḥ / ity uktvā:
XXavsata_u:8825: AVŚ_92.1 sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ /
XXavsata_u:8828: tasyāḥ kālagatāyā nīlapītalohitāvadātair vastraiḥ śibikām (Speyer: śivikām)
XXavsata_u:8829: alaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nītvā jīvako (Speyer: jīviko)
XXavsata_u:8831: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ: evam amukastriyā iyanti varṣāṇi garbhaḥ sthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8833: na cāsau prathamataram avasthito garbho nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8834: adya jīvako vaidyarājaḥ śastreṇa mṛtāyā udaraṃ ghātayitvā taṃ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddhariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:8835: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kutūhalād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi śītavanaśmaśāne saṃnipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:8837: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate: gaccha ānanda,
XXavsata_u:8841: yāvad bhagavān ājñātakauṇḍinyabāṣpamahānāmāniruddhaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandarevataprabhṛtibhir mahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śītavanaśmaśānaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8842: janakāyena ca bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivaraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:8843: tatra jīvakena tasyāḥ striyā dakṣiṇaḥ kukṣiḥ pāṭitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8844: tataḥ svayam eva nirgato valipalitacitāṅgaḥ parijīrṇaśarīrāvayavaḥ:
XXavsata_u:8846: nirgatamātraś ca taṃ janakāyam avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati sma:
XXavsata_u:8847: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu kharāṃ vācaṃ niścārayata /
XXavsata_u:8848: mā haivaṃvidhām avasthām anubhaviṣyatha, yad aham āmāśayapakvāśayayor madhye ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇy uṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8850: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: tṛpyata bhikṣavaḥ sarvabhavopapattibhyaḥ,
XXavsata_u:8853: tatra bhagavāṃs taṃ dārakam āmantrayate: sthavirako 'si dārakaḥ? sthavirako 'haṃ bhagavan* /
XXavsata_u:8856: tato bhagavatā tadadhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:8857: yāṃ śrutvā saṃvignair bahubhiḥ satvaśatair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ //
XXavsata_u:8858: sa ca daśavarṣāṇi gṛhāgāram adhyāsya saptativarṣo bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8859: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pañcaviṃśatyā bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ varṣā upagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:8860: tatra saṃghasthavireṇa kriyākāraṃ kāritaḥ: na kenacit pṛthagjanena pravārayitavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:8861: trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāc caturviṃśatyā bhikṣubhir arhatvaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:8863: tataḥ saṃghasthavireṇa pravāraṇāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ subahu paribhāṣya gaṇamadhyān niṣkāsitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:8864: sa śastram ādāya kuṭiṃ praviśya rudan bahuvidhaṃ paridevate / āha ca:

XXavsata_u:9087: nimantraṇakaṃ gantukāmas taṃ paścācchramaṇam āgacchati, na ca pratilabhate /
XXavsata_u:9088: tatas tena tasyādarśanād anyo bhikṣur nītaḥ /

XXavsata_u:9098: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /

XXavsata_u:9123: yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā udarapūraṇam api nāsādayati /
XXavsata_u:9124: paśyati ca bhikṣūn sunivasitān suprāvṛtān bhramarasadṛśāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9127: sa mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajito 'py udarapūraṇaṃ nāsādayati /

XXavsata_u:9129: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
