XXavsata_u:9132: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena bhagavato gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārjituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9133: sa tāṃ saṃmṛjya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:9134: tatas tena prabhūtaḥ praṇītaś ca piṇḍapāta āsāditaḥ, yenāsya saṃtarpitānīndriyāṇi mahābhūtāni /
XXavsata_u:9135: tatas tena saṃtarpitendriyeṇa kṛtsnā rātrir dhyānavimokṣasamāpattibhir atināmitā /
XXavsata_u:9136: tato 'sya buddhir utpannā: śobhano 'yam upāyo yanv ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vijñāpayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:9138: ahaṃ bhadanta alpapuṇyo yadā gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi,
XXavsata_u:9140: tan me saṃghaḥ kāruṇyaṃ karotu, nānyena bhagavato gandhakuṭī saṃmrāṣṭavyeti /
XXavsata_u:9141: tataḥ saṃghena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ: na kenacid bhagavato gandhakuṭī saṃmrāṣṭavyeti /
XXavsata_u:9142: sa visrabdho gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya paścāc chrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati //
XXavsata_u:9143: tasmiṃś ca samaye āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro janapade varṣoṣitaḥ śrāvastyām abhyāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9144: tataḥ śāstur gauravajāto gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9146: tenocyate: sthavira udare mama prahāro dattaḥ, yat te gandhakuṭī saṃmṛṣṭeti /
XXavsata_u:9149: yadāhaṃ gandhakuṭīṃ na saṃmārjitavāṃs tadā piṇḍapātaṃ nāsādayāmīti /
XXavsata_u:9150: tataḥ sthaviraśāriputreṇoktam: yady evam aham anyatra nimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9155: yadā gṛhapater gṛhasamīpaṃ gatas tadā lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tasmin gṛhe mahān kalahaḥ samutpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9156: tata āyuṣmato lekuñcikasyaitad abhavat: mamālpapuṇyatayā tatra kalaho jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:9157: tataḥ pratinivṛtya vihāraṃ gatvā bhaktacchedam akarot* /
XXavsata_u:9158: tato dvitīye divase sthaviraśāriputreṇocyate: kimarthaṃ tvaṃ na gata iti /
XXavsata_u:9159: tenoktam*: sthavireṇa nāvagatam*: mamālpapuṇyatayā yādṛśas tatra kalaho jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:9160: tataḥ sthaviraśāriputreṇānyatra divase taṃ puraskṛtya tad gṛhaṃ praveśitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9161: saṃghamadhye copaviṣṭasya sataḥ pradakṣiṇaś cāhāro dīyate /
XXavsata_u:9165: śrutvā ca lekuñcikam uvāca: tena hi tvam ihaiva jetavane tiṣṭha, ahaṃ te piṇḍapātam āneṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:9170: caturthe divase sthavirānandenāsthāṃ kṛtvā piṇḍapāto dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9174: pañcame divase sthaviramaudgalyāyanena śrutvā lekuñcikasyāthāya piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā ṛddhyā saṃprasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:9175: lekuñcikasya karmavipākena suparṇinā pakṣirājena pakṣaiḥ parāhatya mahāsamudre pātitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9179: yanv ahaṃ lekuñcikasya piṇḍapātaṃ ###################### lekuñcikasya kuṭikādvāre 'vasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9180: tato lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tad api dvāraṃ śilābhir āvṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:9181: tataḥ śāriputreṇa ṛddhyā mokṣyāmīti tat pātraṃ pṛthivyāṃ sthāpitam* /
XXavsata_u:9184: tato 'pi sthaviraśāriputreṇa ṛddhyā samuddhṛtya tat piṇḍakaṃ mukhadvāraśleṣite piṇḍapāte tasya karmāvaraṇena tan mukham ekadhanaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:9185: tata āyuṣmāñ chāriputro lekuñcikasyābhavyatāṃ jñātvā saṃvignaḥ /

XXavsata_u:9187_1: karmabalodbhāvanārthaṃ ca bhasmanā pātraṃ pūrayitvā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya
XXavsata_u:9187_2: purastān niṣadya udakenāloḍya pītvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /

XXavsata_u:9190: yenārhatvaprāpto 'pi ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā saptame divase nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛta iti /

XXavsata_u:9205: yāvad asyāḥ putraḥ svagṛhe svāmī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9206: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcakaḥ āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāya baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati /
XXavsata_u:9208: tasya mātā tenaiva pūrvakrameṇa śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāny anuprayacchati /
XXavsata_u:9209: tasyāḥ putro mātsaryābhibhūtaḥ kathayati: amba na me rocate (Speyer: rocyate) /
XXavsata_u:9211: sā kathayati: putraka iha kule eṣa kuladharma iti /
XXavsata_u:9214: tathāpy asāv upārdhād dānam anuprayacchati, upārdham ātmanā paribhuñkte /
XXavsata_u:9215: tatas tena mātsaryābhibhūtena krodhenāvṛtabuddhinā bhūyo nivāryata eva /
XXavsata_u:9217: tadā mātaram uvāca: amba kiṃcit karaṇīyam asti,
XXavsata_u:9220: tatas tena dvāraṃ baddhvā ekaṃ bhaktacchedaṃ kāritā /
XXavsata_u:9222: tatas tena kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*: bhasma khādeti /
XXavsata_u:9223: yāvat tenāsau kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptā sakaruṇakaruṇaṃ vikrośamānā ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kāritā,
XXavsata_u:9227: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatiputraḥ,

XXavsata_u:9230: tenaiva hetunā idānīm apy arhatvaprāptaḥ ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā bhasmād anāhāra eva parinirvṛtaḥ /

XXavsata_u:9315: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate: uttiṣṭha gocaragrāmaṃ gamiṣyāva iti /
XXavsata_u:9316: dvir api trir api sthavira āha: vatsa adyāpi prātar eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti /
XXavsata_u:9317: tatas tena taruṇabhikṣuṇā rasagṛdhreṇa kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam:
XXavsata_u:9318: mā tvaṃ pañcabhir api janmaśatair jīvaḥ kośān nirgaccha,
XXavsata_u:9321: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena taruṇabhikṣuḥ, ayam saṃsāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:9322: yad anenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*,
XXavsata_u:9323: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañca janmaśatāni mṛtakuṇapa eva mātuḥ kukṣer nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9324: nirgateṣu pañcasu janmaśateṣu idānīm anena manuṣyatvam āsāditam* /
XXavsata_u:9325: tatas tat smṛtvā kathayati: duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ, paramaduḥkhaṃ saṃsāra iti /
XXavsata_u:9329: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9332: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,

XXavsata_u:9346: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /

XXavsata_u:9348: yadā te piṭakāḥ sphuṭitāḥ, tadā ekadhano māṃsapiṇḍaḥ saṃsthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9349: pūyaśoṇitaṃ cāsya śarīrāt pragharan mahaddaurgandhaṃ janayati /
XXavsata_u:9350: tato 'sya pitā aiśvaryabalādhānena dravyamantrauṣadhiparicārakasametaḥ svayam evārabdhaś cikitsāṃ kartum*,
XXavsata_u:9351: na cāsau vyādhir upaśamaṃ gacchati karmabalādhānaprāptatvāt* /
XXavsata_u:9352: sa svaśarīraṃ tathā vikṣatam apatrāpya parigṛhītaṃ vastrair gopāyati /
XXavsata_u:9354: yāvad guptiko dārako mahān saṃvṛttas tasya vayasyakāḥ sahajātakāḥ śrāvastyāḥ saupārakanagaram anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9355: tatas taiḥ pitur asya kathyate: tāta yady eṣa śrāvastīṃ nīyate,
XXavsata_u:9357: yasmāt tatra santi vaidyabhaiṣajādayaḥ sulabhā iti //
XXavsata_u:9358: tataḥ pitrā tad vacanam upaśrutya prabhūtāni ratnāni paricārakāṃś ca datvā śrāvastīm anupreṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9360: tatrāpy asya karmajo vyādhiḥ saty api vaidyadravyauṣadhiparicārakabāhulye na śakyate cikitsitum* /
XXavsata_u:9361: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /

XXavsata_u:9364: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /

XXavsata_u:9369: sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:9370: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9371: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9372: te 'py asya sahajātakās tenaiva saṃvegena pravrajitāḥ //
XXavsata_u:9374: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ guptikam idam avocan*: kim āyuṣman guptika pralopadharma,
XXavsata_u:9378: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣmantaḥ pralopadharma /

XXavsata_u:9414: yenāsya śārīram evaṃ bībhatsavyādhibahulaṃ durgandhaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:9415: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena tīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti /

XXavsata_u:9550: yad anena paścāc cittaṃ prasāditam*, tenāsya apagatā alakṣmīḥ prādurbhūtā /
XXavsata_u:9552: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9555: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:9558: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:9561_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:9561_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:9561_4: vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:9562: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:9564: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:9565: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:9566: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham*, na me putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:9567: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:9569: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXavsata_u:9571: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:9572: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:9574: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9575: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:9580: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:9582: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9583: pañcāveṇikā dharmā ekatye paṇḍitajātīye mātṛgrāme / katame
XXavsata_u:9585: pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ {puruṣaṃ} jānāti /
XXavsata_u:9590: saced dārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:9591: saced dārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:9592: sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase /
XXavsata_u:9594: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:9596: dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasāryodānam udānayati: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam* /
XXavsata_u:9602: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā mama nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:9603: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:9604: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati,
XXavsata_u:9605_0: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
XXavsata_u:9606: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:9607: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:9608: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:9610: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgika iti nāma kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:9611: gaṅgiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:9612: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:9614: sa ca nirbhedabhāgīyaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhāvāse nābhiramate /
XXavsata_u:9615: sa mātāpitarau pādayor nipatya vijñāpayati: amba tāta anujānītaṃ mām*,
XXavsata_u:9617: tato 'sya mātāpitarāv ekaputraka iti kṛtvā nānujānītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9618: tato gaṅgikasya buddhir utpannā: durlabho manuṣyapratilābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9621: ko me upāyo bhaved yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:9622: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā ātmānamātmanā jīvitād vyaparopayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:9623: yathā manuṣyātvam āsādya laghu laghv eva pravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:9624: tenaivaṃ vicintya viṣaṃ bhakṣitam*, na ca kālaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:9625: agnau patitaḥ, parvatād ātmānam utsṛṣṭavān*, nadyāṃ cārakāyāṃ patitaḥ, tatrāpi kālaṃ na karoti /
XXavsata_u:9626: tasya buddhir utpannā: kaḥ upāyaḥ syād yena kālaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:9627: tasyaitad abhavat*: sarvathāyaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ sāhasikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:9628: yanv aham asya gṛhe rātrau saṃdhiṃ chindyām iti /
XXavsata_u:9629: sa rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagne cakṣuṣpathe saṃdhim ārabdhaś chettum* /
XXavsata_u:9630: tato rakṣibhir jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'jātaśatror upanītaḥ: ayaṃ deva cauro duṣṭo 'pakārī ca,
XXavsata_u:9633: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9634_1: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śrāvaṇāmukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa niṣkāsya
XXavsata_u:9635: sa nīyamānas tān vadhyaghātān āha: śīghraṃ śīghraṃ bhavanto gacchantu,
XXavsata_u:9636: mā kadācid rājñaś cittasyānyathātvaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:9637: tato vyadhyaghātair eṣā pravṛttī rājño niveditā /
XXavsata_u:9638: tato rājñā pratinivartya pṛṣṭhaḥ: ko hetur yat tvam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktum icchasīti /
XXavsata_u:9639: tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa rājñe samākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9640: tato rājā ajātaśatruḥ kadambapuṣpavad āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho rudan mukha udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:9644: yatra nāmāyaṃ pravrajyāhetor idam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktuṃ vyavasitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9645: tato rājñā samāśvāsyoktaḥ: putraka ahaṃ prabhus te jīvitasya /

XXavsata_u:9649: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /

XXavsata_u:9652: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ śraddhāpravrajitānāṃ yaduta gaṅgiko vārāṇaseyaḥ śreṣṭhiputra iti //
XXavsata_u:9653: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:

XXavsata_u:9668: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:9669: AVŚ_98.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:9670: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:9671: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9672: yāvat tena pāthān hatvā bhāṇḍam āsāditam* /
XXavsata_u:9674: yāvad anyatamasmin śmaśāne pratyekabudho nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9677: mātaṅgas tasya purastād bhāṇḍam apasṛjya tatraiva nilīnaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9678: tats te taskarāḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā asyārabdhāḥ kṣeptuṃ śastram agniṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:9679: na cāsya cīvarakarṇakam api śaknuvanti cālayitum*, yasmād asau nirodhasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9680: yadā te taskarāḥ śrāntāḥ prakrāntāḥ, tadā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ krameṇa samādhivyutthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9681: tatas tena śmaśānamoṣakeṇa mātaṅgena taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:9682: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:9684: evam aham api yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:9686: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:9688: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ, ayam sa gaṅgikaḥ /

XXavsata_u:9724: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ?

XXavsata_u:9810: ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika iti āryaśrāvakeṇa abhīkṣṇam udayavyayānudarśinā vihartavyam*,
XXavsata_u:9813: yo 'sya bhavati kāye kāyacchandaḥ kāyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānam*,
XXavsata_u:9814: tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati //
XXavsata_u:9816: katamās tisraḥ? sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
XXavsata_u:9817: yasmin samaye śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:9818: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ: duḥkhā ca aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
XXavsata_u:9819: sukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:9821: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:9822: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:9824: duḥkhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:9826: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:9827: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ, sukhā duḥkhā ca /
XXavsata_u:9828: aduḥkhāsukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:9830: tasyaivaṃ bhavati: imā vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhāvā iti?
XXavsata_u:9831: imā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhāvāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9832: tasya sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayante
XXavsata_u:9834: tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante, vyupaśāmyanti śītībhavanti astaṃgacchanti /
XXavsata_u:9835: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhā vā,
XXavsata_u:9836: tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti,
XXavsata_u:9837: tasya vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānata utpannāsu vedanāsv anityatānudarśī viharati,
XXavsata_u:9839: sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:9840: jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:9841: bhedāc ca kāyasyorddhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi vedanāni apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante apariśeṣam astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
XXavsata_u:9842: tasyaivaṃ bhavati: sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:9844: duḥkhām api, aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:9846: sa sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate, visaṃyukto vedayate, na saṃyuktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9847: duḥkhām api aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate, visaṃyukto vedayate, na saṃyuktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9852: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmāñ śāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan* /
XXavsata_u:9853: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat*: bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati,
XXavsata_u:9854: virāgam eva nirodham eva pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati /
XXavsata_u:9855: yanv ahaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇānudarśī vihareyam*,
XXavsata_u:9858_0: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānudarśino viharato vyayānudarśino virāgānudarśino
XXavsata_u:9858_1: nirodhānudarśinaḥ pratiniḥsargānudarśino viharataḥ anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam* /
XXavsata_u:9859: dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* //
XXavsata_u:9860: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane (Speyer: śāstraśasane)
XXavsata_u:9861: dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:9862: lābheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:9864: labdhavān dīrghanakhaparivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:9865: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:9866: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:9869: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā pratipadya pravedayate: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
XXavsata_u:9871: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
XXavsata_u:9872: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9874: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisaṃvitprāptānāṃ yaduta koṣṭhilo bhikṣur iti //
XXavsata_u:9875: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:9876: kāni bhadanta mahākoṣṭhilena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:9880: koṣṭhilenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:9883: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:9887: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:9888: AVŚ_99.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:9889: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:9890: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ pañcamātrāṇi taskaraśatāni senāpatipramukhāṇi cauryeṇa saṃprasthitāni /
XXavsata_u:9891: yāvat te cañcūryamāṇā anyatamaṃ khadiravaṇam anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9892: yāvat senāpatinābhihitāḥ: paśyata yūyaṃ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kaścid aparakīyo manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
XXavsata_u:9895: tatas tais taskaraiḥ paryaṭadbhir dṛṣṭvā senāpatisakāśaṃ nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9896: tataś caurasenāpatinā vadhyatām ayam ity ājñā dattā /
XXavsata_u:9897: tato 'sau pratyekabuddhas teṣām anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ khagapatham abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9898: tataḥ senāpatir mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
XXavsata_u:9899: piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:9900: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
XXavsata_u:9901: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena caurasenāpatiḥ,
XXavsata_u:9906: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9909: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:9912: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:9917_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
XXavsata_u:9917_1: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
XXavsata_u:9918: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:9919: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya āntareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
XXavsata_u:9920: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:9921: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9922: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* /
XXavsata_u:9923: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:9924: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9926: upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pādaṃ pādenopadhāya ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvann iti //
XXavsata_u:9927: tatra bhagavān rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9928: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt* ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9930: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati ubhau yamakaśālavanasya drumottamau tathāgatasya siṃhaśayyāṃ śālapuṣpair avākiratām* /
XXavsata_u:9931: samanantaraparinirvṛte bhagavati anyataro bhikṣus tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:9932: AVŚ_100.1 sundarau khalv imau śālavanasyāsya drumottamau /
XXavsata_u:9934: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati śakro devendro gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:9936: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham* // iti
XXavsata_u:9937: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati brahmā sahāṃpatir gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:9942: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān āniruddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:9949: pradyotasy eva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣas tasya cetasaḥ //
XXavsata_u:9950: saptāhaparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataś citāṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvan* gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:9951: AVŚ_100.7 yena kāyaratanena nāyako brahmalokam agaman maharddhikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9952: dahyate sma tanujena tejasā pañcabhir yugaśataiḥ sa veṣṭitaḥ (Speyer: veṣṭhitaḥ) //
XXavsata_u:9953: AVŚ_100.8 sahasramātreṇa hi cīvarāṇāṃ buddhasya kāyaḥ pariveṣṭito 'bhūt* / (Speyer: pariveṣṭhito)
XXavsata_u:9954: dve cīvare tatra tu naiva dagdhe abhyantaraṃ bāhyam atha dvitīyam* //
XXavsata_u:9955_0: varṣaśataparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati pāṭaliputre nagare rājā aśoko rājyaṃ kārayati
XXavsata_u:9955_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:9957: yāvad apareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:9958: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:9959: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:9960: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kuṇālasadṛśābhyāṃ netrābhyām* /
XXavsata_u:9961: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:9962: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātamātrasya kuṇālasadṛśe netre,
XXavsata_u:9963: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kuṇāla iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:9964: kuṇālo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:9965: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:9967: tatas taṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ rājā utsaṅgena kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ prekṣya rūpasaṃpadā praharṣita uvāca:
XXavsata_u:9969: tatra ca samaye gāndhāre puṣpabherotso nāma grāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9970: tatrānyatamasya gṛhapateḥ putro jāto 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:9973: ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā, puṣpasaṃpannaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:9974: yatra yatra kumāro gacchati tatra tatra ca puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:9977: tato 'pareṇa samayena puṣpabherotsād vaṇijaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena pāṭaliputraṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9978: te prābhṛtam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9979: tataḥ pādayor nipatya prābhṛtaṃ rājñe upanamayya purastād vyavasthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9980: tato rājā aśokas teṣāṃ kuṇālaṃ darśayati: haṃ bho vaṇijaḥ,
XXavsata_u:9981: kadācit kutracid bhavadbhiḥ paryaṭadbhir evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaviśeṣayuktaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam iti ?
XXavsata_u:9982: tatas te vaṇijaḥ kṛtakarapuṭāḥ pādayor nipatya abhayaṃ mārgayitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:9983: asti deva asmadīye viṣaye sundaro nāma kumāro 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:9984: janmani cāsya divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:9986: yatra yatra ca kumāro gacchati tatra tatra puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:9987: śrutvā rājā aśokaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9989: eṣa rājā aśoka āgantum icchati sundarasya kumārasya darśanahetoḥ /
XXavsata_u:9990: yad vaḥ kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kurudhvam iti /
XXavsata_u:9991: tato mahājanakāyo bhītāḥ: yadi rājā mahāsādhanena ihāgamiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:9993: tataḥ sa kumāro bhadrayānaṃ yojayitvā śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ prābhṛtasyārthe datvā aśokasya sakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9995: śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'śokasya sakāśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:9996: rājā aśokaś ca sahadarśanāt sundarasya kumārasya rūpaṃ śobhāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ ca divyāṃ puṣkariṇīm udyānaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ //
XXavsata_u:9997: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:9998: tatropaguptapramukhāṇy aṣṭādaśārhatsahasrāṇi nivasanti, taddviguṇāḥ śaikṣāḥ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakāḥ /
XXavsata_u:9999: tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:10001: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10002: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10003_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
XXavsata_u:10004: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10005: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
XXavsata_u:10006: tato rājā aśokaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ sthaviraṃ pṛcchati: kāni bhadanta sundareṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:10008: kāni punaḥ karmāṇi yena divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:10012: mahārāja pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:10015: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:10019: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:10020: AVŚ_100.1 na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
XXavsata_u:10021: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:10023: tadā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ pañcaśataparivāro magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran dharmasaṃgītiṃ kartukāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:10024: yāvad anyatamena daridrakarṣakeṇa mahān bhikṣusaṃgho dṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10027: tatas tena kāśyapapramukhāṇi pañca bhikṣuśatāni jentākasnātreṇopanimantritāni /
XXavsata_u:10028: tatas tena nānāgandhaparibhāvitam uṣṇodakaṃ kṛtvā te bhikṣavaḥ snāpitāḥ, cīvarakāṇi śobhitāni /
XXavsata_u:10029: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpya śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:10030: asminn eva śākyamuneḥ pravacane pravrajya cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti //
XXavsata_u:10031: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena daridrakarṣakaḥ, ayaṃ sa sundaro bhikṣuḥ /
XXavsata_u:10034: divyacandanodakaparipūrṇā ramaṇīyā puṣkariṇī puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:10035: yat tena śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni upalabdhāni, teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:10036: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:10039: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:10042: atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
